description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程介紹一些打造品牌的經驗，讓企業認知到核心品牌識別的重要；並且協助經理人在競爭激烈的市場，運用新的行銷手法以鞏固品牌優勢。除此之外，本課程並提供決策者在通路管理上一些運用工具及策略，讓品牌在優勢通路環境中有更大的效益。
description.en: In this course a few brand creating experiences are introduced in order to emphasize the significant effect of the brand identification and to win the battle which is in such a competitive market by some promotion methods. Besides, it provides managers and decision makers with proven tools and go-to-market strategies for refining channel strategies and managing distribution relationship.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，其內容包括國內外全球運籌之發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、績效衡量及其他與全球運籌相關議題，如供應鏈管理、物流、金流及通關等。此外，本課程亦將提供案例研討，以本課程理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course intends to discuss some important issues regarding global logistics management. The contents include the development of global logistics environment around the world, global logistics functions, global logistics business models, performance evaluation and other global logistics related topics, like global supply chain management and global logistic flow. Besides, this course will provide the opportunity of case study for the purpose of  emphasizing on both the theoretical and practical issues.

description.zh: 當企業實施全球運籌經營模式;其市場行銷點、產品設計部門、製造工廠、配銷中心與維修服務中心時常散佈於全球不同地點，且各項文件資料或圖檔仍需在全球各點間依權限設定供企業內部與供應鏈成員瀏覽使用，以提昇產品價值與品質、快速回應客戶需求、降低產品設計與製造成本和企業獲利保證。故透過功能超強的網際網路基礎與企業電子化架構之經營環境為全球運籌之必備利器，亦即為虛擬企業之碁石。除此之外，企業亦可經由網際網路與電子化架構和供應商及客戶進行協同商務,可以確保供應鏈內的所有成員都能夠輕易的存取到最即時且正確的產品資訊，故可縮短協同行銷設計、協同產品設計、協同製程設計和協同配銷之週期時間，並提升產品開發團隊的互助合作。藉由設計知識的擷取與重複使用、溝通效率的提高、以及將客戶和供應商緊密的整合在一起，進而更快速的設計出更好的產品，也把重要的創新和寶貴知識傳遞給更多的合作伙伴和供應商，此即為虛擬價值鏈。企業電子化管理課程將介紹企業資源規劃(ERP)、供應鏈管理(SCM)、RFID 之應用, 產品資料管理(PDM)、虛擬製程設計, 製造執行系統(MES)與生產現場資訊整合系統 (SFIS)、知識管理(KM)等電子化模組以及它們如何串連以營運虛擬企業，另外
description.en: At present stage, globalization and multiple-sites running are evitable for enterprise to save cost and accomplish the aim of more profit. Therefore, E-business running is necessary to reach quicker response and share the updating information and documentation among multiple-sites and its supply chain. These information and documentation are accessed globally between marketing department, R&D department, production shop floor, financial department, service center, and retailers. To keep correct information and connection, enterprises have to acknowledge the flow process of each E-modules. More often, enterprises have to monitor each E-modules to guarantee the employee do their jobs based on correct and update information. In addition, the global competition became more intensive between supply chains. That is, a supply chain competes with another supply chain. Therefore, the collaborative capabilities for the members within a supply chain became more crucial. The collaborative commerce

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001052或負責教授同意。介紹 2D/3D CAD概論、實體模型系統、特徵式設計系統、曲面模型系統、CAD或CAE系統示範與實作。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software packages, Review of Numerical techniques for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, and surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

description.zh: 自動化機械相關機電界面等技術問題，內容包括自動化機構、致動器、感測器、控制器等之原理介紹，並配合機電整合設備，使同學由實習中獲得機電整合之概念。
description.en: Interface Techniques Concerning Automatic Machinery; Subjects Include Theory and Application Know-How of Mechanisms, Actuators, Sensors, And Controllers; Experiments also provided.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002011或負責教授同意。特徵值、特徵向量及特徵函數，向量分析、向量微積分、傅立葉級數與邊界值問題、偏微分方程、複變函數。
description.en: Eigenvalue and Eigenfunction Problems, Vector Analyses, Calculus of Vectors, Fourier Series, Boundary Value Problems, Partial Differential Equations, Complex Analyses.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001017或負責教授同意。導論、質點系動力學、非剛體動力學、分析力學Lagrange方程式、振動理論。
description.en: Introduction of Dynamics of a System of Particles, Dynamics of Non-Rigid Body, Lagrange's Equation, and Vibration Theory.

description.zh: 不可壓縮流體、質量不滅、非黏性流體之運動、柏努力定律、線性及角動量定理及其應用、渦流與勢流、黏性流、納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及其應用、管中壓力頭損失及增加、邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Fluid Statics, Basic Equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume, Introduction to Differential Analysis of Fluid Motion, Incompressibility in Viscid Flow, Dimensional Analysis, Internal in Compressible Viscous Flow, External Incompressible Flow, and Introduction to Compressible Flow.

description.zh: 從闡述各種汽車共生系統在特定的工業製程，商業智慧型大樓或大學校園區域網路型式等能源有效利用的整合規劃設計，主要課程內容為：1.汽車共生系統概念 2.熱力循環的技術理論 3.多元化的原動機利用4.複合循環發電廠 5.都會型汽電共生利用 6.汽電共生的能源管理 7.汽電共生的環境管理 8.各種熱電轉換裝置           9.高級能源轉換科技之汽電共生
description.en: By studying this course, the following terms can be identified, defined, used: 1.The Concept of Cogeneration system 2.Theory of Cogeneration Technology. 3.Combined cycles plant. 4.Heating and cooling integration with power generation.5.The Design Concept and Demonstrated economic performance of cogen. sys. 6.Social and Environmental management of cogen. sys. 7.Conversion Method and    Technology on advanced system.

description.zh: 數學基礎簡介，轉換函數，訊號流程圖，實際系統數學模式之求得，狀態方程式，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡圖，控制系統之頻域分析，時域及頻域下之控制器設計。
description.en: Course Title:Automatic Control PracticeDescription:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts ofcontrol systems and the mathematical background, second, state thetransfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, andforth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques andfrequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the characterof control systems, Finally, the design of control system will beintroduced.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。
description.en: course title : signals and systemsdescription : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

description.zh: 一、線性連立方程式二、矩陣基本運算三、行列式四、向量空間與基底五、線性相依與線性獨立六、線性轉換七、正交空間八、特徵值與特徵向量
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
description.en: The subjects of the course include 1) fundamental theories of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms, 2) kinetic data collection and manipulation, 3) design equations for ideal reactors, 4) discussions on nonideal reactors, and 5) nonhomogeneous catalytic reactions.

description.zh: 此內容為化工程序的理論基礎，探討熱量與質量輸送之現象，以便應用於化工單元操作以及反應工程有關之計算與設計。
description.en: The course introduces the principles of the chemical process and discusses the heat and mass transport phenomena. And its application to the chemical unit operation and reaction engineering.

description.zh: 配合理論基礎、單元操作單元程序與程序控制，動態模擬之設備，瞭解實際工廠運作之情形。
description.en: A laboratory course practices the theories of the unit operation, process control and dynamic simulators.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)線性代數 (2)向量微積分 (3)傅立葉分析 (4)偏微分方程
description.en: His course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Linear algebra. (2) vector differential and integral calculus.(3)Fourier analysis.(4)Partial differential equation.

description.zh: 本實習課程設計,讓學生經由儀器及裝置的操作印證理論,內容包含物理化學.聚合物合成,高分子物性檢測,環工檢測技術,生化發酵技術,表面化學技!,乳化技,電化學技術以及有機物合成與分析技術等.
description.en: This laboratory course is designated to acquaint the student with the experiment methods of practical instrument and apparatus. It contains the following topics: physical chemistry, polymerization techniques, analytical methods in environmental science, biochemical methods in fermentation, surface chemistry, emulsification techniques, electrochemistry, and organic syntheses.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

description.zh: 首先對銲接熱源，輸入熱、熱傳導、化學反應、殘留應力生成等與銲接冶金相關的基本起源作一介紹，再以鋁合金、鎳基合金、碳鋼、合金鋼、不銹鋼為例，分別從銲道融溶區、部分融溶區，到熱影響區學習銲接製程導致的冶金現象。主題包括固化組織、晶粒結構、次晶結構、相變態、偏析、固化裂紋、熱裂紋、再加熱裂紋、氫脆、再結晶熱處理性等。
description.en: At the beginning, this course makes an introduction to the related source of weldingheat source, input heat, heat transfer, chemical reaction, residual stress and weldingmetallurgy, moreover, it examplifies aluminum alloy, nickle alloy, carbon steel, alloy steel and stainless steel to describe metallurgical phenomenon from weld fusion zone and partial fusion zone to the welding process which is influenced byheat energy. Its main subjects include solidification, crystal structure, second particle structure, phase deformation, segregation, solidified cracks, hot check, reheat check,hydrogen embrittlement, recrystallization, heat treatment property, etc..

description.zh: 解釋各種合金平衡狀態之相變態過程，並以顯微組織輔助說明，由簡而繁，循序漸進，使同學容易領悟。內容包括結晶之均質孕核，非均質孕核，凝固過程之相變態，各種合金之相變態過程等，尤其是鋼鐵之相變態過程，加強同學對鋼鐵相變態之領悟能力。
description.en: It explains the phase transformation process of all kinds of alloy at the equilibriumstate, with the aid of metallograph, it lets students easily understand it step by step.Its contents include the homogeneous nucleation, anisotropic nucleus, the phase deformation of solidification process, all the phase deformation process of alloy, especially at the phase deformation process of ferrous, in order to strengthen the perception ability to the ferrous phase.

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、鑽石、電子束、離子束、電漿、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，由冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結機械另件、燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過冶金課程的學生，能進一步對製造技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: Introduction to manufacturing processes, and introducing newest manufacturing technology. Applying physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials,

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microsope,the theories of forming image and diffraction, the applications of material science. The course contents include the transmission electron microscope structure,the electronic magnetic lens and image formation theory, electronic diffraction theory, diffraction diagram analysis, and the making of test sample, the structure and forming image principle of a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS.

description.zh: 本課程是設計給大學及研究所的理、工科學生作為研習科技法律的入門課程，內容大體上包括有專利法簡介、商標法簡介、著作權法簡介、營業秘密法簡介、網域名稱簡介、個案討論等等。在二十一世紀知識爆炸的時代中，技術創新已然成為企業競爭力不能忽視得一環，成功的企業無不就其開發出來的技術想盡辦法佈施層層法律保護網，於是，如何分析解讀競爭對手的法律保護網，如何研發出完全相容又具競爭性的產品，是現代研發單位不能不面對的一項課題，所牽涉到的層面多與科技法律相關。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary technology law study for college and graduate school students majoring in science and engineering . It is focused on issues related to: An introduction to Patent Law, An Introduction to Trademark Law, An introduction Copyright Law, An Introduction to Trade Secret Law, An Introduction to Domain Name and Case Discussions,etc.  In the 21st century characterized by the information explosion, technological innovation has been widely recognized as being a vital factor to the competitiveness of business. Successful companies have always tried their best to implement broad-reaching legal protection of their innovated technologies.Consequently, it appears to be essential for every R&D unit to know how to analyze the legal protection fo the competitors' products and how to develop a fully compatible and competitive product.

description.zh: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧，推估並了解                                         不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
description.en: Introduction the methods of engineering cost calculate.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure,its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure,their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystallinestructure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity,electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain, dislocation theory, the formation and growth of nucleus, alloy phase theory, degree of freedom of crystal boundary , nucleation and homogenization of casting product,hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon andtheory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understandthe theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

description.zh: 本課程以訓練學生對陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對結構陶瓷與電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。
description.en: This course is aimed at training student in knowing ceramics materials, and furtherintroduce the fundamental manufacturing process of ceramics materials. It focuson the preparation method, roast-sintering and its theory of ceramics pulverulentbody. Apart from strengthening the knowledge of traditional ceramics, it alsohas a systematic introduction to the structural ceramics and electronic ceramicsapplication.

description.zh: 介紹各種奈米結構材料：奈米碳管、奈米線、量子點、量子線和奈米複合材料的基本特性以及製備與應用技術，期能對奈米材料的物性、製造與應用有整體的認識。
description.en: This course will deal with the chemical and physical properties of nanomaterials. It will cover the preparation, structure, properties and applications of quantum dots and lines, carbon nanotubes, and nanocomposites.

description.zh: 本課程針對各種資源之特性，使學生瞭解開發各類資源之方法及各種機器之應用。其內容包括：資源探勘、資源蘊藏量評估、資源開拓、資源開採、地下開採、地面開採、大型機器之應用及特殊工程施工。
description.en: Various mining exploitation methods and mining equipment involved are introduced in this class. It includes exploration, reserve calculation, resource exploitation, and mining operations (underground and surface).

description.zh: 1.晶體結構與晶體生長 2.載體濃度與能階圖 3.載體傳輸,擴散,漂移 4.半導體的光電特性 5.pn接面分析
description.en: 1.crystal structures & crystal growth 2.energy-band diagrams & carrier densities 3.carrier    transport 4.optoelectronic properties of semiconductors 5.pn junctions

description.zh: 此概論為資源工程的入門學科，其範圍包括天然的金屬、非金屬、礦物與石油、天然氣、建築用砂石、石材與水等原生資源，以及工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的可再生資源。期對初學者有一整體的基本概念。
description.en: This is a general introduction class to provide student basic knowledge about resources engineering which include metal, nonmetal, minerals, petroleum, natural gas, aggregates, dimension stone and water resources.

description.zh: 主要課程內容包括電腦語言設計以及套裝軟體之使用。
description.en: The major course includes the brief introduction of computer, computer language and the application of package software.

description.zh: 材料之特性取決於材料內部組織，所以課程內容也注重內部組織與材料特性之間的關係，內部組織的變化對材料特性之影響，由理論為基礎之探討至實際之應用上。對本課程有關的基本概念，則詳加說明，初學材料者能得到材料上所必備之基本知識，若基本概念已有充分了解，則利用這些知識即可參考材料規格或手冊就可得到欲知之條件，進而以此概念作基礎，亦可研習更高深之學問，本課程內容著重於介紹材料之結構，基本原理有： 1. 金屬之基本理論，金屬及合金之構造，材料之組織，塑性加工變形之理論，材料之物理化學，機械性質及其實驗。 2. 鋼和鐵之製造，組織及其熱處理，變態理論。 3. 構造用鋼，合金鋼，工具鋼，特殊鋼之特性、用途及其熱處理方法。4. 鋼之表面硬化理論及其熱處理方法。 5. 鑄鐵之冶煉，種類及其熱處理方法。6.非鐵金屬材料，銅，鋁，鈦，鎂，錫，鋅，鉛，鎳等合金種類之特性及其處理方法。
description.en: The chacteristics of material depend on the inside tissue, therefore, the content alsoput more emphasis on the relationship between the inside tissue and material chacter-istics, how the change of inside tissue influences it in full details from the discussion of the theory basis to practical application. It has a detail description to the basic ideaof this course, the novice may get requisite fundamental knowledge. Once they fullyperceive these basic ideas, they may refer to material specification or manual to getthe conditions they request, or they may use these fundation to further exploreadvanced knowledge. This course focus on introduction to the structure of material,its fundamental theorem includes the following items.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。
description.en: The course mainly targets at the brief introduction to the fundamental principles, characteristics and application of the metallics, ceramics, polymer,composite material. Its content includes the crystal structure and defect, atomic diffusion of the solid materials, phase diagrams and phase transformation, material manufacturing process and application, the physic property(optical, electrical, magnetical and thermal property), mechanical property(strength, ductility& maleability, hardness, toughnesss, fatigue, and creep), strenthening structure and method.

description.zh: 本課程討論化學分析之相關理論，計算及操作。包括分析中之誤差，統計，重量法，体積法，水溶液，活性，平衡及平衡之計算，沉澱滴定，氧化－還原反應及電化學等基礎探討。
description.en: The course discusses the relating theory, calculation and operation of the chemical analysis, which includes analysis error, statistics, weight method, volume method, solution, activity, equilibrium and the calculation of equilibrium, settling titration, oxidization-reduction reaction, and electrical chemistry.

description.zh: 主要目標在介紹與實際問題相關之數學領域，以模擬解題及詮釋等方式，將數學方法應用在工程問題上。課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，Fourier 分析及偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。內容將繼續介紹複數分析及數值方法等章節，尤其對計算機的概念及演算法乃給予較多的強調，對實際問題亦有簡化討論。另外，在應用解決問題構想，練習例題及理論間，更有相輔相成的效果。至於線性規化，圖形組合，機率理論及數學機率等內容亦有概略介紹，務使同學有正確的認知。
description.en: The course*s main target is to introduce math region which is relating to practical questions with simulate solution and interpretation, it applies the math method to engineering questions. The course content includes ordinary differential equation, linear algebra, vector calculus, Fourier analysis and partial differencial equation partial differential equation, with the aim to train students in establishing an exact perception to the meaning of theory, calculation and experimentation. it also introduces complex number analysis and numeric method, especially put more emphasis at the computer concept and algorithm, a simplified discussion to the practical problem as well. Besides, it has a mutual supporting effect in solving question concepts, practising model question and theory. As to the linear programming, graphs and combinatorial optimization, probability theory and mathmetical probability, this course also has a brief introduction, its target is to let all the students

description.zh: 本課程包括土壤之工程性質、岩石之工程性質、地下水之生成及對工程之影響、工程地質調查之基本原則及各種調查方法簡介等。
description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of geology. Application examples are introduced in the fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical industry, etc..

description.zh: 由於重大工程建設陸續開發，對環境之衝擊也日益明顯，因此環境影響評估制度之建立與執行也極為迫切，環境影響評估確能有效抑制開發工程中所可能形成的污染行為，本課程之目的即在介紹環境影響評估制度的演進、各國相關之評估法制、環境影響評估之應用、評估方法（專家委員法、圖形重疊法、矩陣法及網路法）、評估流程及環境影響評估之追蹤考核等單元，期使選修者，對環境影響評估建立正確和科學的認知。
description.en: EIA (Environmental Impact Assessment) is interdisciplinary and involves large numbers of different practicals.In this course the theory will be firstly introduced,then the case studies will also be discussed.

description.zh: 期使學生瞭解地震工程學涵蓋之領域，並簡介地球物理學、地質學、地震學、振動學、材力、土壤力學、結構動力學、施工技術以及彈性波動學各領域之基本知識，讓學生領悟如何將各學門知識領域應用於地震工程之設計與施工。
description.en: Use of soil mechanics principles in the analysis,design,and construction of earth structures.Principles of compaction and compaction control;an introduction to slope stability analysis and landslides;earth reinforcement systems,and ground improvement techniques.

description.zh: 期使學生瞭解耐震設計之法規與設計步驟，並介紹營建工程結構物之耐震特性、設計方法及結構物隔震技術之應用，訓練學生能自行考慮與判斷結構物之耐震能力，以從事合理之耐震設計。
description.en: Use of soil mechanics principles in the analysis,design,and construction of structures.Principles of compaction and compaction control;an introduction to slope stability analysis and landslides;earth reinforcement systems,and ground impovement techniques.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在建立學生對預力構材的基本觀念。由對預力的認識、材料的要求，以主預力損失的瞭解及估算方式。從而由應力的觀點，討論撓曲斷面的分析及設計。最後再以施工及力學的須求方面探討預力鋼索佈置狀況。期使學生在修習後，能具備初步預力分析及設計之能力。
description.en: This course is aimed at establishing the basic concept of prestressed members to the students。It starts from introducing the high strength materials required by prestressed design，then the calculation of prestress losses are showns。The analysis and design of a flexural member are shown in a complete manner。

description.zh: 本程主要教授學生熟悉 (1)結構設計各部驟之計算方式及其電腦程式之使用方法 (2)教導學生自行準備輸入資料，並操作以求取結果 (3)根據學生之電腦輸出結果或操作中之偵錯方法及結果正誤之研判方法。
本課程主要教授學生七大項方向1.複習矩陣學2.結構矩陣學基本概念3.勁度法觀念4.勁度法解桁架問題5.勁度法解梁問題6.勁度法解剛架問題7.程式分析實習
description.en: The course contents are divided into 7 major topics: 1. Review the matrix theory; 2.Basic concepts of the matrix structural theory; 3. Stiffness method; 4. Using stiffness method to solve truss problem; 5. Using stiffness method to solve beam problem; 6. Using stiffness method to solve rigid frame problem; 7. Practice of the structural analysis program.

description.zh: 基礎水文及流力,基本水理(明渠水力),防洪工程,模型理論,作業研究,經濟分析,迴水演算,三峽工程論證.
description.en: Introduction,Hydraulic and hydraulic review,Flood migration,Model similitude,Operation research,Economical analysis,Gradually varied flow,Case study.

description.zh: 本課程的內容係針對目前在大地工程界的基礎工程施工實務為主軸依序介紹給學生:1.地質粘探與判識      2.地質與土壤的分類與力學參數的評估3.地下連續壁施工      4.基樁(全套管及無套管工法)施工5.基礎開挖(順打工法及逆打工法) 6.安全支撐系統(型鋼或地錨工法)7.基樁或地錨載重試驗  8.安全監測系統.
description.en: The instruction material covers the up-to-date constructiontechnology of foundation engineering,such as:subsurface ivestigation,soil classification,evaluation of mechanical properties,slurry wall construction,foundation excavation....etc.

description.zh: 使學者學習流體力學基本理論。課程內容概要：(1)緒論、(2)真實流體流動、(3)管流理論、(4)可壓縮性流體、(5)邊界層理論、(6)昇力理論、(7)渠流理論。
description.en: Fundamentals of fluid mechanics,Model similitude,Pipe flow,Open channel flow.

description.zh: 本課程主要說明國內外營建自動化之發展內容，並學習與自動化有關之各種專業技能，使學生具備從事自動化研發工作之能力，進而提升土木與營建業之社會形象。
description.en: This course will introduce the development situations of foreigner and Taiwan's construction automations. The purpose of this course is planning to let students understanding all kinds of automation techniques in construction industry, and creates the R & D capabilities for each student. Such purpose can increase the society reputation of construction industry.

description.zh: 本課程目的旨在提供一般初學者對環境工程有一個廣泛的認識，課程內容多以概論性述說為主，包括給水工程、污水工程、空氣污染防制、固體廢棄物處理、噪音振動控制、土壤污染及復原技術、環境影響評估及地球環境問題等幾個單元，冀望藉由簡單明淺的講授，激發對研究環境工程的興趣，進而達到環境保護之目的。
description.en: Junior standing.Introduction to environmental engineering as applied to water guality,water quality modeling and water and wastewater treatment.

description.zh: 介紹工程契約之內容與種類，以及其實際的作業程序及相關的投標規定；此外並說明規範的製定內涵與意義，同時探討其對工程之影響與重要性。
藥物化學主要根據藥物所瞄準或希望控制的生物目標來區分及探討藥物的開發、分類及功能.此課程含概以下八項主題:1.	藥物功能的物理化學原理  2.	受納體及影響體理論3.	受納體分類方法4.	藥物在神經傳遞受納體的作用5.	藥物在賀爾蒙等受納體的作用6.	非傳遞者目標的藥物作用7.	藥物分布及代謝8.	藥物設計之原理
description.en: Medicinal chemistry discusses drugs on the basis of their molecular targets. This course will cover the following eight different topics.1.	Physicochemical Principles of drug Action.2.	Receptor-Effector Theories.3.	Methods of receptor Characterization.4.	Drugs Acting on neurotransmitters and their neurohormones, and Receptors.5.	Drugs Acting on Hormones,Neurohormones, and their Receptors.6.	Nonmessenger Targets for Drug Action.7.	Drug Distribution and Metabolism.8.	Principles of Drug Design.

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 講述色彩、表色系統、測色、色彩容許度、色差、色彩管理和電腦配色之基本概念。
description.en: Description of the basic concept of color, color-order system, color measurement, color tolerance, color difference, color control and computer for color matching.

description.zh: 以纖維材料與複合材料的知識為基礎，實際應用於纖維系複合材料實習；並利用各種現有之機械與電氣性質檢測儀器，對其性能加以評估。其實習內容包括熱可塑與熱固性樹脂之製備；單軸向、雙軸向與三軸向複合材料之加工等之實習;及複合材料機械與電氣性質等之實習。
description.en: On the basis of knowledge from the fiber and composites, various experiments are carried out.  Different measuring instruments are also used to measure and evaluate their mechanical and electrical properties.  The practice includes thermoplastic and thermosetting resin preparation, fiber prepreg preparation, 1-D, 2-D, and 3-D composites processing methods are included. Such as filament winding, hand lay-up, molding compounds, autoclave and vacuum bag method, injection molding, compression molding, SMC, and BMC, pultrusion etc. Otherwise, the mechanical and electrical properties of the composites are also studied.

description.zh: 為使學生對高分子物理有所認識，本課程之設定將涵蓋所有高分子物理之相關課題，其主要內容分以下兩大部份(I)高分子之非結晶性質(II)高分子之結晶性質。而兩大部份中，又各分以下數單元講述: (I) 高分子之非結晶性質 (a) 高分子鏈之機率結構 (b) 分子鏈之運動方式 (c) 高分子熱力學 (d) 自由體積理論(含Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ之探討) (e) WLF經通曲線 (II)高分子之結晶性質 (a) 結晶晶格之分析 (b) 高分子結晶度及順向度之估計 (c) 結晶度對高分子機械性質，導電性質，及熱性質之影響 (d) 溶液晶體與熔融晶體之比較 (e) 熱結晶及張力結晶之比較
description.en: This course is designed to make students theroughly understand the problems related to polymer physics. The main content will include two major topics:(I)Amorphous Polymer(II)Crystalline Polymer. The detailed items included in the course are: (I) Amorphous Polymer (a) Random-Walk Theory for Chain Configuration (b) Chain Conformation and Movements (c) Polymer Thermodynamics (d) Free Volume Theory (including the study on Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ…etc.) (e) WLF Master Curve (II)Crystalline Polymer (a) Unit Cell Analysis (b) Polymer Crystallinity and Orientation Measurement (c) Effect of Crystallinity on Mechanical, Dielectrical, and Thermal Properties of Polymeric Materials (d) Solution Crystals vs. Melt Crystals (e) Thermal Induced Nucleation vs. Stress Induced Nucleation.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹各類有機材料在光電工業上之應用。包括感光性有機材料用於電子構裝及微刻蝕影、絕緣及低介電材料、光碟染料、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電有機材料。
description.en: This course is an introduction course to introduce varied organic materials in the application of optoelectronics. It includes light sensible organic materials for electron package, photoresist, photoimaging. The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode, and conducting polymer.

description.zh: 本課程係說明纖維之形態與微觀及巨觀結構、纖維長度分佈與斷面、密度、吸水性與膨潤性、機械性質、光學性質、熱性質，黏彈性質，及電氣性質等物理性質及其測試。
description.en: The course interprets the following subjects, such as: (1) Morphology of the fibers. (2) Microstructure and macrostructure of fibers. (3) Staple fiber length and cross-section. (4) Fiber density and absorption. (5) Mechanical properties. (6) Optical properties. (7) Thermal properties. (8) Fiber Viscoelasticity. (9) Electrical properties etc and their testing.

description.zh: 本門授課之目的在於介紹奈米材料及其製程(包括濕式及乾式奈米材料法)，並探討奈米材料的未來發展及應用。所包括的課程主題如下：1.奈米材料與奈米化學簡介。2.奈米材料與結構分析3.奈米材料製成4.奈米材料自我組成5.奈米材料模擬6.碳奈米微管7.中孔洞奈米晶體之合成8.半導體奈米粒之製備與應用9.奈米材料的遠景與未來發展
description.en: The course introduces nanomaterials and their preparation processes (wet method and dry method).  The future development and applications are also discussed.This course will cover the following topics:1.	Introduction of nanomaterials and nanochemistry2.	Nanomaterials:  structure and analysis3.	Nanomaterials:  processing4.	Nanomaterials:  self-assembly5.	Nanomaterials:  simulation6.	Carbon nanotubes7.	Synthesis and sintering of mesoporous nanocrystals8.	Growth and application of semiconductor nanoparticlesProspective vision of nanomaterials

description.zh: 本課程之目的在培養學生論文尋找及期刊選讀之能力，每位學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。問題的認定，由老師協助資料之準備及口頭報告等是學生不可少的。且一學期至少須報告1次。學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度及兩份書面資料決定。
description.en: This course is aimed at providing a training of review and paper studies for 4th grade students. Students are requested to search for the latest papers for a specific topic. Presentation and discussion are required for all attendants, twice persemester. The final score for a student will be determined based on students interaction in the class and two written reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為電子構裝高分子、電路成像高分子、光電子成像材料、最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電性及有機電晶體材料。
description.en: This is a special course on the topics of optoelectronic polymer materials. It includes polymers for electron package, photoresist, and photoimaging. Also, the advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode, conducting polymer and organic transistor.

description.zh: 介紹顏料的種類以及顏料粒子、結構與其色澤牢度之關係。
description.en: It introduces all kinds of pigments available in the market currently and its  relationship between the particle size and chemical structure with the properties and colour of pigments.

description.zh: 內容包括高分子聚合反應，高分子結構及其物理性質。並包含高分子物性的鑑定及高分子流變學和加工。另就橡膠、塑膠、纖維，由結構、性質、用途、產品，做比較和說明。
description.en: A major objective of this course is to provide a background in polymerizations, polymer structures and polymer properties. The material in this course also covers polymer characterization,polymer rheology and polymer processing. In addition , tructures, properties, usages and products of rubbers, plastics and fibers are emphasized and compared.

description.zh: 本課程主要簡介紡織科技所包含之原料,製程,製品和評估，同時訓練學生了解基本的紡織辭彙。
description.en: Textile materials and related processes are introduced, and technical used  are learned as well.

description.zh: 本課程的教學目的在於期望同學能具備相當的製圖與識圖的能力，其內容包含基本圖學概念、傳統正投影圖學及基本機械製圖概念。
description.en: The object of this course is to make students capable of making and understanding the engineering drawing.  The contents of text are Fundamental drawing concepts, systems of projection, views on drawings, sections and sectional views, conventional representations, principles of dimensioning, methods of dimensioning common features.

description.zh: 教授化學儀器分析原理、應用、儀器裝置及限制,準確度等。內容有紅、可見、紫外、X光 、核磁共振光譜、表面分析之電子質譜方法、熱分析以及不同的分析方法如  、液體層析等。
description.en: This text will introduce the fundamental principles and  Applications of modern Analytical instruments.Measuring devices, limitations of measurements in terms of sensitivity and accuracy will also be taught. The contents are infrared, visible, ultraviolet, X-ray and nuclear magnetic spectroscopes, Analysis of sur-faces with electron beams and mass spectrometry, thermal methods and chromatography and related separation methods.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的乃從化學的角度去瞭解及討論有關氣相分子與固體表面間的作用情形，包括表面結構、吸附/脫附、表面鍵結及反應等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is, from chemistry point of view, to discuss the interaction of gas phase molecules with solid surfaces. It includes surface structures, adsorption/desorption, surface bonding and surface reaction.

description.zh: 染料發色理論，染料類別與性質，染料中間體，偶氮染料之製備以及分散、反應、直接等染料之結構與性質之介紹與說明。
description.en: It covers the chromophores. Colour Index intermediates and properties of different kinds of dyes.  The details of preparention of azo dyes,disperse dyes and reactive dyes and also described.

description.zh: 介紹有關紗線之製造原理、技術與流程。在此課程中提供了有關於紡紗機械之實際操作，其包括有棉系與毛系紡紗與假撚加工絲所使用之機械設備等。甚而對纖維與紗形成階段間之相互關係可有更廣泛之瞭解，及有關於他們特性的評估及檢測方法。
description.en: The course is designed to introduce a practical course in the principles, technique and spinning processes involved in the textile yarns and industrial yarns manufacturing.  This course provides the practical operation for spinning machines involved in short staple and long staple spinning frames, and false twist machine etc.  A comprehensive understanding of the inter-relationships of the yarn and fiber forming stages as related to their evaluation and testing is also practiced.

description.zh: 1.發展歷史與演進2.程序觀念3.非同步平行程序4.死結及無限等待5.主記憶體管理6.虛擬記憶體結構與管理7.處理器排程8.磁碟管理9.網路及系統安全
description.en: 1.History and evolution 2.Process concepts3.ASynchronous concurrent processes4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt5.Real storage management6.Virtual storage organization and management 7.Processor scheduling 8.Disk mansgement9.Network and security

description.zh: 1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統3. 雙旁波帶AM調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統4. 單旁波帶AM調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸5. FM調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en: The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 2.design of analog filters3.double sideband AM systems4.single sideband AM systems5.FM systems6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems10.digital passband transmission11.multiplexing systems12.design and simulation of communication systems

description.zh: 瞭解微算機系統架構，介面設計等原理。內容包含：1.微算機系統架構介紹，2.I/O架構介紹，3.I/O介面標準介紹，4.單晶片微電腦系統介紹，5.匯流排標準介紹，6.微算機系統介紹，7.設計微電腦硬體結構。
description.en: 1.Introduction to microcomputer system architectrue2.I/O architecture3.I/O interdfacing standard4.Single-chip microcomputer system5.Bus system6.Microcomputer system7.Hardwared design of microcomputer system

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比系統,進而能培養學生具有設計類比系統的能力,課程內容包念： 1.ispPAC與PAC-Designer簡介2. 濾波電路設計 3. 量測介面 4. 類比與數位控制振盪器設計 5. PWM電路設計 6.   Σ調變電路設計 7. 電壓與溫度監控電路 8. 感測介面的應用 9. 專題
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of FPAA system. Therefore, the student has the design capability of FPAA system. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction to ispPAC and PAC-Designer 2.Filter Design 3. Measurement Interface 4. Analog and Digital Controlled Oscillator Design 5. PWM Circuit Design 6.   Σ Modulation Circuit Design7. Voltage and Temperature Monitoring Circuit 8. Sensor Interface Application 9. Final Project

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵、以配合企業整體競爭策略和形式。其內容計有：人力資源的分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬，人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course is intended as an introduction to the field of human resources management. How a corporate fully utilizes its internal resources-employees, including their capabilities, knowledge, techniques, attitudes and motivation to fit its corporate competitive strategy. This course includes human resources analysis, strategy and targets, the access, development and reward of supportive operations, and the maintenance of human resources.

description.zh: 由於科技進步，交通發達，縮短了各區域間之距離，製造業面臨了許多衝擊，因此如何在全球市場上佔有一席之地是現代經營與管理者必須思考的。本課程主要是整合市場機能、顧客導向、行銷企畫、生產製造、研究發展、人力資源、社會責任、工業安全及環境保護等領域，其重點涵蓋：如何架構企業組織，使其製造生產的產品能滿足市場需求、如何結合市場機能與製造功能，使企業永續經營、如何生產產品，使其具有市場競爭力、探討產品成功之關鍵點，使競爭策略具體化、探討新的思考方式以發展出具有競爭性的策略。
description.en: This course is dedicated to integrate the marketing functions, customer orientation, market planning, production, R&D, human resources, community responsibilities, industrial safety and environmental protection.  Its emphasis includes development of corporate organization, integration of market and manufacturing functions, production of goods, discover of product CSF and discussion of new thinking approaches.

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems.  The contents include introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: This course purpose is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager.  Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 本課程著重實務應用，內容將涵蓋現場改的原則與基本技術，生產流程的改善技術，現場庫存與交其改善的技術，設施佈置改善技術；降低成本的技術，目視管理的改善技術，生產效率改善技術，生產系統的改善技術等。
description.en: This course will focus on the topic of On-Job Improvement principle, production flow improvement, inventory control, facility planning, cost reduction, efficiency and production system improvement etc.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程係針對大學生授課標準研擬有關個人及企業投資及財務之管理。本課程之目的在使學生瞭解如何使相關之投資獲得良好報酬，介紹企業財務結構。企業資金分配情形。企業如何籌措資金及相關財務理論之應用。本課程研究內容包括：財務市場結構、利息因子、財務規畫及分析、股票、債券、租借問題、資金預算分配及風險性、長期借貸、有價證券等。
description.en: This course includes modern theory of business finance with emphasis on analytical and quantitative skills, treatment of firm's investment financing, dividend decisions in a valuation framework, survey of related empirical work, net present value, portfolio theory, capital asset pricing model, efficient capital markets, option theory, and effect of inflation.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。本課程之內容如下：  1.物流管理和策略  2.運輸和配送  3.保管與包裝  4.定單處理  5.採        購  6.物料搬運  7.物流成本  8.物流服務  9.資訊系統10.物流生產力衡量
description.en: The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place,and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way.The content of the course discription:  1.Transpor totion  2.Inventory maintenance  3.Order processing   4.Purchasing   5.Warehousing & packaging  6.Materials handling  7.Logistics costs  8.Logistics customer serrice  9.productivity meajurement

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格2.企業環境的偵察3.策略形成4.策略執行與評估5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function innvolved in management.The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning.The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 從企業經理人的觀點來操討談判的有關問題，旨在提供學生對談判佑識的了解，並熟悉談判的實務運用。課程重心涵蓋談判的本質與觀念性架構，談判的理論與模型，談判的規劃、執行與控制，談判的策略與技能。上課方式操研討為主，並操分組報告與討論。
description.en: The viewpoint of business manager focus into the issues of negotiation. The objectives of this course are to provide understanding some of the core concepts of the negotiation and to acquaint application approach of the practice. The negotiation topics cover: (1) nature, conceptual, framework, theory and model and (2) to analyze, plan, strategy, tactics, and implement successful negotiation. This can povide groups discussion and improve speaking skills.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

name.en: Introduction to Integration of Production Planning and Control

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動也結合這些相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質，提升企業競爭力。發展自動化及電子化之同時，也該就相關知識及資訊進行整合，如此方能生產規劃與現場控制之相關活動作最好之協調。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於規劃與控制之相關知識，以及進行整合時所需之觀念及技術。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive，the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore，the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology for integrating production planning and shop floor control.

description.zh: 本課程以提供學生訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming, Network analysis, Dynamic programming, Game theory, (Non)Integer linear programming, Markov chains(Markovian decision process), Queueing theory, Inventory models, Forecasting models, Decision analysis and system simulation.

description.zh: 探討工作研究涵蓋之各項技術：時間研究、動作研究、程序分析、作業分析、影片分析、工作抽查、標準工時與效率管理、動作經濟原理、生產線平衡、生產力衡量等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with a resource which describes the techniques and procedures of motion and time study .It contains: techniques of methods study, work station design, PTS, stop watch time study, standard data, assembly line balancing.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程是依大學課程標準訂定，適合於二技及四技學生修習有關工程投資分析與相關問題之探討。本課程之目的在尋找能使工程投資之獲利或報酬最佳化的相關方法，並介紹學生瞭解工程投資方案之本質；如何做預算分配，使得投資得到最佳報酬；工程投資環境；及投資方案之分析法。本課程包括下列主題：利率因素及通貨膨脹、稅率及匯兌之效應、資金預算分配問題、不確定性及風險性、投資方案之各種層面分析：生產、經濟、管理、環保及政治等方面。
description.en: The objective of this course is to examine the engineering investment decision problems. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, tax and exchange rate, capital budgeting, uncertainty and risk, investment projects and its relationships with production, economics, management, environment, and politics.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解全面品質管理的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、品管工具，品管工具以外的管理工具、方法，實施全面品管遭遇到的問題，實施全面品質管理的預期成效。
description.en: This course introduces the meaning, theories, importance, scope, implementation constraints, methods, quality control tools of TQM.  Besides, the other management tools and approaches are also included.  The course also contains the possible problems and expected effective as implementing.

description.zh: 本課程在教授學習者能熟悉Dreamweaver的功能，如何建構網站、製作網頁、使用Dreamweaver  的操作環境採用圖形界面處理畫面，並搭配HTML原始碼便可自動產生，此軟體同時可以即時交互編輯修改，編輯文字、插入分隔線、表格製作、超連結、圖形編輯、圖層應用等功能，輕鬆便可產生一般與動態的網頁，整合網頁以及網頁特效設計，甚至包含程式組等多樣式網頁型態。透過此課程學習者能使用此軟體不僅製作一個基本的商業網站，更可以匯入多樣的動態媒體，增加網站內容的互動性與豐富性。1.基本網路技術2.網路資料管理技術3.管理資訊系統技術4.網路管理資訊系統計樹5.分散式資料管理技術6.群體決策支援系統技術7.網路技術在高階主管資訊系統的應用
description.en: The course is for the designation of commercial web site. Learning how to build up the commercial website.with Dreamweaver

name.en: Operation and Management of Real Estate

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為提供學生瞭解不動產開發案相關之理論基礎及實務經驗。不動產經營所涉及的領域甚廣，因此課程內容安排著重實務討論及法令解說，藉由案例分享瞭解地方政府落實開發建設可能涉及的資源課題與對策，例如容積獎勵、稅賦減免、都市計畫變更及容積移轉等；另外開發案財務分析導論及比較，讓學生可以系統性的認識各種類型不動產開發案之收益、稅制、規劃限制及風險等，除了增加實務的認識，對於個人理財亦有幫助。課程內容包含1.基礎財務分析、2.不動產相關法令解說、3.不動產產品規劃及銷售實務、4.不動產開發流程及實務、5.產業創新案例分享、6.產業政策與方向及7.實際案例參訪等。
description.en: The course provides both theoretical and pragmatic knowledge in real estate management. Course contents emphasize on practical recitations and codes commentaries. Factors such as area-allowanced incentives, tax reductions, amendments in city planning, and transfer area allowance are addressed in each case study. In addition, financial benefits, tax regulations, design constraints, and risk assessment in development different types are presented in systematic manner thru the course. Course topics include: 1. Fundamental financial analyses. 2. Real estate regulations and codes. 3. Real estate planning and marketing. 4. Procedures in real estate development. 5. Innovations in practice. 6. Real estate policy. 7. Visitation in projects.

description.zh: 都市設計是一種整體性、全面性的思考，他包含了對都市內整體全般的活動記其所一存的實質環境安排，同時他也處理既有建成環境的成形及其與自然環境間的關係對應。並思考處身於其間的人們如何在社會與經濟的各種層面做出最適切的回應並具體呈現於空間裡。	故之，一個好的都市設計絕對不僅止於技術上的分析評估，他更關切於人們如何看待環境，如何面對環境思考，如何面對環境思考，與如何參與程式設計的成形。	這個專題將討論什麼是都市設計極其重要性，都市設計在現時處境下所面臨的挑戰，以及我們可以如何藉由都市設計創造一個可為適切的都市環境。
description.en: Urban Design should to be understood to apply to all scales of and types of urban activity and to be concerned about the physical arrangement and functioning of urban activities, the physical appearance of the built environment and its relationship to the natural environment, the way in which people experience it and the social and economic factors which influence its quality.	So achieving good urban design does not require that every decision maker becomes skilled in important design decision know what the people involved in important design decision know what to look for, the questions to ask, and have at least a rough idea of the criteria to consider.	This course will discuss urban design what is it and why is urban design important, what are the challenges, and how to setting our fundamental directions for achieving a more cohesive and satisfying environment.

description.zh: 本工程對基礎工程施工時容易產生的隆起、沙湧、上舉、液化、地下室上浮等災害介紹其產生之原因與案例，同時在時間許可下也介紹高層建築中常見的連續壁工程及逆打工程師公中應注意的要點
description.en: This course purpose to illustrate the cause and case for foundation construction failures and disasters, which includes Heaving, Quick Sand, Up-Lift, Liquefaction and Basement UP Lift, etc. If time is allowed, I will extra introduce which important to pay attention items for construction of Slurry Wall Engineering and Up-Down construction Method Engineering which often be used in High-Rise Architecture.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 建築防火避難與消防設備2. 給排水衛生化糞設備3. 升降機設備系統4. 智慧型建築概論5. 垃圾處理設備6.物理環境衝擊影響評估與對策
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the second step of a series course, its content including:1. Architecture Fire Safety. Fire Escape and Fire Fighting Equipment2. Plumbing Equipment3. Elevator Equipment4. Introduction about Intelligent Building5. Refuse Treatment Equipment6. Physical Environmental Impact Assessment and Resolution.

description.zh: 以案例分析方式介紹整體的房屋實體，要求同學從現實世界中發掘構造問題並建立解決問題之作業能力
description.en: Introducing an integrated building reality from selected case studies. This course require student finding issues in real world and excese problems solving process.

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程主要目標包括以下各方面：1.介紹與瞭解電腦繪圖在環境規劃設計上的應用方法與理論。2.具備將設計作品以數化處理與數位表達的技術與能力。3.學習建築設計三度空間模擬的動畫。4.自動化設計與輔助繪圖思考。授課內容主題包括：建築專業輔助繪圖設計軟體的介紹應用，包括平面繪圖表現，3D模型設計表現，建築專業設計3D動畫模擬處理，自動化繪圖與自動化設計理論介紹，空間資訊系統理論與方法，設計專案的競圖表現與應用。
description.en: The goal of this class:1.We introduce theory of computer-aided architectural design and we apply the method to environmental planning & design.2.We learn how to presentation architectural design by digital method, tools and technology.3.We learn how to simulate architectural design by animation with 3D spatial data model.4.We introduce theory about automatic architectural design and design thinking.The contents of this class is included about: introduction and application of professional soft of computer-aided architectural design, 2D's presentation of computer-aided architectural de

description.zh: 本課程內容為對二十世紀具特色的建築作品從事專題性的分析、研讀，以訓練學生運用建築史知識深入評析作品內涵的能力。授課採研討方式，研修者須自選一經認可之重要建築作品，在授課老師指導下進行分析、研討的操作。
description.en: Students require to study and to analyze the distinctive architectural works of the twentieth century. This is to strengthen the ability of applying the knowledge of architectural histories to analyzing in depth the internal of the architectural works. Class will be carried on by seminar. Student needs to study a piece of architectural work which should be approved by the lecturer. The study and analysis of the piece of work will be then conducted under the lecturer's instruction.

description.zh: 本課程主要為介紹與歷史建築與古蹟之保存與再利用相關的觀念、理論、技術與發展概況，授課採講演方式。
description.en: This module introduces primarily the involved concept, theory, technique and the general conditions of its development. Class will be conducted by lecturing.

description.zh: 各種建築類型分析：1.博物館、美術館2.住宅3.高齡者福利設施4.醫療設施5.社區活動設施6.劇場。
description.en: The analysis of the building types: a. Museum. b. House. c. Welfare facility for aged. c. Medical facility. e. Community center. f. Theater.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.
The content of the courses is the same as3903010

description.zh: 前言: 本課程主要為介紹現今主要名家與重要學派之設計理念與其實踐狀況，授課採講演與研討方式進行。內容: 瞭解設計相關理論與方法。 瞭解設計之方法與課題。 瞭解設計研究之寫作與閱讀方法。 方式: 由授課老師依不同時期，介紹所屬領域之理論、方法及參考文獻。授課方式，採講義、討論、參觀及邀請演講等方式綜合進行。為
description.en: he content of this course is to introduce the design philosophy and implementing skills of contemporary noted architects and major schools. This course will be carried on by lecturing and seminar.

name.en: Introduction to History of Modern Architecture

description.zh: 待修正；本課程大致依下列階段進行：1.基本歷史背景介紹及特有名詞介紹、2.現代建築的盟芽期1850-1900、3.現代建築成長期1900-1920、4.現代建築黃金期1920-1930、5.二次大戰前現代建築概況回顧。
本課授課內容延續建築計畫（一）的架構來進行其內容如下：1.	建築計畫相關理論介紹2.	各種建築之建築計畫介紹：學校、圖書館、旅館、醫院等3.	實例分析
description.en: The course content about following:1.	Introduce theory of planning2.	Introduce to :planning of school、library、hotel、hospital3.	Case study

description.zh: 本課程主要在講解建築物外部空間的營造方法，內容包括理論及實際案例的說明。授課主題涵蓋：1.敷地計畫之相關理論、2.敷地計畫之內容及程序、3.基地調查及分析、4.規劃方法與計畫評估（包括土地使用、外部空間、交通動線、排水、整地、植栽）、5.環境影響評估、6.案例分析。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction of outdoor spaces. Through cases studies, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning.Topics focus on six premises:1.	theories in relation to site planning;2.	design sequences of site planning;3.	investigations and analyses of the sites;4.	planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.	environmental impact assessment;6.	cases studies.

description.zh: 課程主要透過電腦圖形的表現及動畫的介紹來深入探討它們在建築上的應用,尤其是在"虛擬"及"實境"領域。利用現有之應用軟體,如AutoCAD及3DS,學生將從模型的基本建立、表現及動畫到影像的輸出或者結合多媒體應用等相關之技術。課程內容部份將會傳授並調查如何經由新的媒介來傳達我們在建築空間的認知與成果。
description.en: This course will focus on advanced technologies in the production and presentation of computer-based rendering and animation and their particular uses in relationship to architecture, both "real" and "virtual." Using 3DVIZ, students will model, render, and animate projects for output to video or for use in multimedia presentations. Readings will investigate how new media transform our perception and production of architectural space. Computer Visualization or a thorough knowledge of the fundamentals of computer modeling is prerequisites.

description.zh: 介紹台灣軌道車輛現況及未來、軌道車輛名詞、轉向架與懸吊系統、軌道與設施、車輛動態、輪軌界面、推進傳動與制動、行控號誌、大眾捷運系統、輕軌電車、高速鐵路、軌道公司參訪。
description.en: This course is a basic course of railroad vehicle system.  Topics will be mentioned: railroad vehicles in Taiwan, terminology, bogie and suspension systems, rail and construction, vehicle dynamics, wheel and rail, drive / transmission and brake, train control and communication, mass rapid transit system, light rail transit system, high speed rail transit system, and tours in railway company..

description.zh: 介紹汽機車上各控制系統之硬體及控制策略，包含引擎系統之空燃比、怠速、冷起動、爆震、廢氣，傳動系統之變速、傳動，煞車系統之ABS、TCS、SRS，懸吊系統之半主動及主動式懸吊，智慧型道路系統之頭燈、環境、巡航、跟隨、夜視等控制系統。
description.en: This course introduces hardware and control strategies used in each control systems in a vehicle.  These control systems include engine system (AF ratio, idle speed, cold start, knocking, exhaust), transmission system, brake system (ABS, TCS, SRS), suspension system (semi-active and active), intelligent transportation system (headlight, environment, cruise, following, night vision) etc..

description.zh: 1.布林代數與邏輯閘  2.組合邏輯  3.同步循序邏輯  4.同步循序設計  5.非同步循序邏輯  6.非同步循序設計
description.en: This course offers students a basic concept about how to design a logic circuit. A couple of examples proposed in this course which have appeared repeatedly in the design of digital systems will be presented to illustrate the design concept.1.Boolean Algebra and Logic Minimization  2.Combinational Network Design  3.Analysis of Synchronous Sequential Networks  4.Design of Synchronous Sequential  5.Analysis of Asynchronous Sequential  6.Design of Asynchronous Sequential Networks

description.zh: 先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意燃料及燃燒，基本熱傳理論，蒸汽動力廠，壓縮機，燃氣輪機，內燃機，汽油引擎，柴油引擎，冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 先修課程:微積分或負責教授同意常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，拉普拉氏轉換，級數及傅立葉級數，線性代數及矩陣，積分定理。
description.en: Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transforms, Power Series, Linear Algebra, Matrices.

description.zh: 先修課程:物理或負責教授同意不可壓縮流體，質量不滅，非黏性流體之運動，柏努力定律，線性及角動量定理及其應用，渦流與勢流，黏性流，納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及其應用，管中壓力頭損失及增加，邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Fluid Statics, Basic Equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume, Introduction to Differential Analysis of Fluid Motion, Incompressibility in Viscid Flow, Dimensional Analysis , Internal in Compressible Viscous Flow, External Incompressible Flow. Introductionto Compressible Flow.

description.zh: 數學基礎簡介，轉換函數，訊號流程圖，實際系統數學模式之求得，狀態變數分析，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡圖，控制系統之頻域分析。
description.en: Basic concepts of control systems and the mathematical background, transfer function, block diagram, signal flow graph, mathematical modeling of control systems, state vrariable analysis, stability analysis, time-domain analysis, root locus techniques, frequency-domain analysis.

description.zh: 空調設計基礎、空調冷暖負載計算、空氣線圖應用分析、主要設備規範擬定、空調系統規劃與設備選用分析、風管工程設計、水配管工程設計、設備配置與裝設工程、材料與成本分析、節約省能規劃設計。
description.en: Fundamentals of HVAC system design, cooling/ heating load estimation, analysis of applied psychometrics charts, schematic design of HVAC system, main equipment selection, main equipment specification, air duct & water piping system design, equipments layout & installation, materials & cost analysis. HVAC's energy saving & energy efficient planning.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括通風系統基礎，工業通風，排煙設計，空氣過濾、送風系統設計及安裝與測試，以系統設計為重點。
description.en: The contents of this course include the fundamentals of ventilation system, industrial ventilation, exhaust design, air filtration, air moving system design, construction and testing, the focus of this course is on the system design.

description.zh: 數位通訊系統簡介，通訊網路技術簡介，網路協定與架構，資料連接控制，區域網路系統，傳輸層協定，應用於控制系統動作之概述，包括冷凍空調設備上的各種控制如溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等。
description.en: Introduction to digital communication systems and communication network technology, network protocol and architecture,data link control, LAN systems,internet transport protocols, applications in system control and device actuation, include equipment of HVAC & R systems, such as temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow controla and so on.

description.zh: 本門課藉由濕空氣線圖討論空氣調節之過程，分析人體舒適與空氣品質之需求，及各種空調設備系統之設計。本門課在空調負荷計算原理與方法涵蓋輻射熱、熱傳導及熱儲存效應等之分析，系統設計包括送風與送水系統之計算與設計，及室內送風分佈之理論與設計。
description.en: Air-conditioning processes are discussed by using psychrometric charts. Thermal comfort and indoor air quality requirements are presented. Design of air-conditioning equipment and systems are introduced. Air-conditioning load analysis includes radiation, transfer, and heat storage effects. System design includes design and calculation air and water moving systems. Air distribution principles and design are also covered.

description.zh: 本科目將由不可壓縮流體在各種流動環境所產生之流體分子流動現象之認識，進而利用各種有關因次群，熟習包含可壓縮流體在內之實際應用上所必須具備之基礎方法；如雷諾數．伯努力方程式等。利用流利基礎分析，流體機械之流場與動力，及管路內流場與壓力之變化。
description.en: Introduction to flow phenomena of incompressible flow, discussion on the dimensionless groups and their applicants, derive the conservation equations such as the Bernoulli equation, using fluid mechanics to analyze the field and the dynamics of fluid machinery, pipe and duct flow are also discuss.

name.zh: 冷凍空調熱力熱傳學(二)

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en: The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to:1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems, an    examine their economic and technical characteristics.2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator    PV systems, and discuss their operation.3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show    its feasibility and future   potential.

description.zh: 能源概論，熱力學，非再生能源，再生能源的利用，能源的有效變換，未來能源的發展形態，有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。
description.en: General introduction, thermodynamics, non-renewable energy, use of renewable energy, energy conversion, future development, evaluation and analysis of energy effectiveness, energy effectiveness, energy management.

description.zh: 針對企業管理不同的對象，如經營策略、經營文化、事務管理、預算管理等，以實際個案方式介紹並討論。
description.en: This class will introduce and discuss the application on the following topics: Business strategies, business culture, factory management, and budgeting management.

description.zh: 以管理經理的角色，經營組織運作系統，包括代理權與機構間的結合，課程包含1.以策略態勢，瞭解和定義零售和批發商概念。2.學習通路管理和行銷組合。3.學習通路規劃、統合和組織。4.學習通路評估與管理。
description.en: This course includes:1. Important concepts in retailing and wholesaling are defined and explained from a strategic perspective; 2.Study channel management and the marketing mix; 3.Study channel planning, coordination and organization; 4. Study channel assessment and control.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在培養學生對生產系統運作之了瞭解，並具備生產及作業管理知識。授課內容包含：生產力、競爭力、策略、產品需求'之預測、生產計劃、MRP、生產排程與跟催、存貨管理等。
description.en: The course is helping stdents to understand the operation of production system and the knowledge of Production and Operation management.  The course includes:  Productivity, competivity, Production planning.  MRP , Production Scheduling and following-up, inventory management, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: This course introduces the plan design , analysis and implementation of business management system it includes the analysis of management system , feasible research , system design , system design development prototyping , testing , documenting and evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生作為一位諮詢顧問師所需具備的技巧及在今日工商社會中有效溝通的要件。課程涵蓋之主題為：（1）管理諮詢的目的和範圍，（2）顧問師的職責和角色，（3）諮詢過程，（4）計畫書的擬定與合約的草擬，（5）訪談與展示的技巧，及（6）手冊與研究報告的撰寫。學生必須完成一項分組個案來應證在本課程所學得的管理諮詢與溝通技巧。
description.en: This course teaches the students basic skills possessed by a management consultant and the criteria for effective communication in today's business community. Topics covered by this course are: (1) Scope and Purpose of Management Consulting, (2) Duties and Roles of A Consultant, (3) Consulting Process (4) Writing a Proposal and Drafting A Contract, (5) Interview and Presentation Skills, and (6) Development of a Manual and Report Writing. A group project is required to demonstrate student's understanding of the consulting and communication skills learned in this course.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵、以配合企業整體競爭策略和形式。其內容計有：人力資源的分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬，人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course is introduce that how to use resource about inside of Business and staff. It's including ability, knowledge, technology, attitude and encourage. To harmony with tactics and form of entirety business. The context of course have Human Resources Analysis, tactics and goal, support to operating about how to get, developing, rewards, and maintain of human resources.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The marketing course is suitable to college student.The ourpose is to find good method of product marketing,in order to persuit good profit of enterprise.The course contents' goal makes student understand the idea of marketing , product design.product transportion,promotion and price setting.The related course includes :market segmentation,market organization,the behavior of buying , product development,retailing,whole-saling promotion,adveristing and price seeting process.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解與企業（工業）相關之法律，以為未來就業時能具備基本之法律基礎。課程大綱如下：商事法之特質、民法概述、商業登記法、公司法、票據法、保險法。
description.en: This course is set to make the students understand the concepts of laws dealing with related industrial and business, and being the base of working in the futures. It includes: 1. The characters of business laws. 2. The presentment of civil code. 3. The business registration laws and business laws. 4. The insurance laws.

description.zh: 本課程整合心理學、社會學、 決策行為學等理論，介紹消費者的產品購買思維，以及產品消費行為，並討論企業如何應用消費 者行為分析的各項研究發現與理論，以提高行銷規劃與市場活動 效能。課程內容包括：1.消費購買的行為模式。2.消費行為的心理學與社會學基礎。3.消費者認知過程與心理發展。4.社會互動關係與購買行為。5.產品涉入對消費行為的影響。6.情境因素對消費行為的影響。7.態度的形成與改變。8.消費者行為分析在行銷管理的應用。學生修習本課程之後，將對行銷規劃之主要變數，如產品設計、零售企劃、廣告促銷、定價策略等，有一扎實的行為科學方面的理論基礎。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to help the student develop a good grasp of the variables that affect consumption and the implications of this knowledge for actual business decisions.  Among the more specific goals, the course should improve the student's ability to: 1. Understand the sociological and psychological variables that shape the consumer decision process, 2. Identify various ways to segment a consumer market, 3. Examine the target market before making marketing-related decisions, 4. Identify new business opportunities, 5. Appreciate a variety of techniques for changing attitudes, 6. Learn how to maximize satisfaction and customer loyalty, and 7. Apply a knowledge of consumer behavior to a variety of entities ranging from non-profit organizations to e-commerce.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 一、 簡介二、 數學模式三、 小信號干擾之系統響應四、 同步機之模擬五、 同步機之線性模式六、 激磁系統七、 激磁對穩定度之影響八、 多機組系統之穩定度
description.en: 一、 Introduction二、 The Mathematical Model三、 System response to small disturbances四、 The simulation of synchronous machines五、 Linear Models of synchronous machines六、 Excitation System七、 Effect of excitation on stability八、 Multimachine Systems with constant Impedance loads

description.zh: 1. 電力系統經濟調度2. 傳輸損失3. 機組規劃4. 水火力機組協調5. 發電控制6. 電力系統互聯7. 電力系統安全度8. 狀態評估
description.en: 1. Economic dispatch of power system2. transmission losses3. Unit commitment4. coordination of hydro-thermal generators5. generation control6. inter-connected power systems7. Security of power system8. State estimation

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Optimal Control 的理論基礎與其應用﹐範圍從古典的早期發展到最新的進展都包括在內，其目的在使同學能具有最佳控制器設計能力。 內容包括: 最佳化問題求解、線性二次調整器設計、線性二次高斯觀測器設計。此外，現代控制中常用的loop shaping及loop transfer recovery技術亦將在課程中介紹。預修課程 ： 線性控制系統(可同時修)、工程數學
description.en: 1.	Introduction.2.	Mathematical preliminaries for optimal control.3.	Classical linear quadratic optimal control, including regulation & tracking control.4.	Observer based optimal control (LQG control). 5.	Loop shaping and LTR control.  This is a course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to design an optimal controller for linear systems with a specific performance index. Concepts such as optimality condition, linear quadratic regulation (LQR), and linear quadratic gaussian (LQG) problem are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also includes the loop shaping concept and the loop transfer recovery (LTR) technique which are frequently used in the modern control.

name.zh: 平面顯示器驅動電路與晶片設計
name.en: Driving Circuit and Chip Implementation of Flat Panel Displa

description.zh: 平面顯示器簡介、液晶材料與晶胞、絞線型液晶的電光特性、光在異質介質中的入射現象、改良式線型液晶顯示器、亞態型液晶顯示器, 液晶顯示器的驅動架構、絞線型液晶顯示器的被動式驅動模式、亞態型液晶顯示器的被動式驅動模式、非晶矽薄膜電晶體液晶顯示器的驅動模式、多晶矽薄膜電晶體液晶顯示器的驅動模式、彩色濾光器與晶胞配置、特用晶片的設計流程、鎖相迴路設計、顯示器昇壓電路設計、背光模組昇壓電路設計與數位/類比轉換電路設計等內容。
description.en: Introduction to FPD, Liquid crystal materials and cells, Electro-optic effects in TN liquid crystal, Light incident angle through anisotropic media, modified nematic liquid crystal displays, bistable liquid crystal displays, address schemes for LCD, passive matrix addressing of TN displays, passive matrix addressing of bistable displays, addressing of LCD with a-Si TFT, addressing of LCD with poly Si-TFT, colour filter and cell assembly, ASIC design flow, PLL design, voltage boost circuit of LCD, voltage boost circuit of backlight, and DAC design.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力的關鍵，本課程主要內容為：    1.能源成本控制    2.區域型電力能管理策略    3.能源系統的經濟性設計概念    4.冷暖系統的檢測與分析    5.總合能源操作的工程化資料收集    6.新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to.1.Compare and contrast the various forms of energy eonversion.2.Examine the techmologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3.Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4.Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5.Deformine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6.Analyze the methods in which energy can be conserved with in the various energy sectors of society.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括Wavelet轉換、變分法及積分方程等工程分析之技術，且以Matlab軟體來應用至影像處理、噪音振動、最佳控制、偏微分方程等工程應用實例。.
description.en: Including Wavelet transform, Variation principle, and integral equation Engineering Analysis technology, try to use Matlab software apply to Image processing, denoise, optimal control, and solving partial differential equations.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 類比系統、數位系統設計、數位控制及微處理機、介面程式設計、程式語言及軟體等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Analogy systems, Digital systems designed, Digital control and microprocessors, Interface programming design, Computer programming, software and Lab.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods, Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization, Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Techniques, and Optimum Design of Precision Machine Components and Systems.

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意建立法律之基本概念與法律應用之知識，實務之科技企業經營與法律策略之整合。依據科技產業對法律知識需求之特性，概分三大類：(1)科技法律，包括智慧財產權，網際網路與電子商務法律，網路犯罪，智權契約與授權，企業智權管理等，(2)財經法律，包括國際經貿(WTO)爭端解決，國際投資與併購，證券交易，大陸投資等法律，(3)爭端解決機制：訴訟與偵查搜索程序，仲裁，調解，協商談判等
description.en: This course aims to make students realize basic law concept and common sense of law application, simultaneously to integrate between practical technology business management and law strategy.  According to need for technology industries in the respect of law, this course is divided into three parts: (1) Technology Law - including Intellectual Property Rights, Network and Electronic Business Law, Network Criminal, etc. (2)Financial Law - including laws  of WTO dispute resolution, international invest & acquire, stock trade, Investment in PROC, etc. (3) System of Dispute Resolution etc.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: (1)資料庫系統簡介，(2)關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3)資料表正規化，(4)結構化查詢語言，(5)交易管理與並時控制(6)分散式資料庫管理系統(7)物件導向式資料庫(8)電子商務中之資料庫(9)資料庫管理(10)網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 1.高速PCB佈線設計的流程與基本原理 2.高速PCB的阻抗特性與反射現象 3.傳輸線的串音現象 4.電源與接線佈線技術 5.高速PCB中穿孔、連接器與IC封裝的探討 6.輸出入緩衝器資訊規格模型 7.高速PCB的量測技術 8.案例說明
description.en: 1.Flow and Fundamentals of High-Speed PCB Layout Design 2.Impedance Characteristic and Reflections in High-Speed PCB 3. Crosstalk in High-Speed PCB 4.Layout Technology of Power and Connection Lines 5.Discussion of Vias, Connectors, and Packages in High-Speed PCB 6.IBIS (I/O Buffer Information Specification) model 7.Measurement Technology of High-Speed PCB 8. Case Study

description.zh: 1.無線通訊系統簡介2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹3.無線電通訊的傳播原理4.行動通訊之調變技術5.行動通訊之多工技術6.天線﹑多元性與系統分析7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼8.無線網路系統9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

description.zh: 1.政府採購法簡介 2.標準作業模式 3.特別採購模式 4.建築師及工程顧問之甄選及聘用 5.公平合約之訂定 6.異議申訴制度 7.其他
description.en: the management of financial affairs1.	the introduction of government purchasing law2.	standard working model3.	specific purchasing model4.	the choose and employ of architect and engineering consultant5.	the making of fair restrict6.	the making of reporting objection 7.	others

name.zh: 建築施工災害與應變措施
name.en: Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures

description.zh: 基礎開挖施工作業的災害最主要的是擋土牆的傾倒,這是源自於隆起、砂湧及管湧的現象。開挖區的土壤為砂土,如果擋土牆漏水,由於淘空所形成的管湧,會導致鄰房的損壞;由於擋土牆貫入深度的不足以及點井措施的不良,會造成開挖區的砂源,最終導致擋土牆的傾倒。開挖區的土壤如果為粘土,而且粘土含水量大於液限,則開挖區的粘土產生塑性液,使支撐系統挫屈破壞,最後造成擋土牆的破壞。這些原理皆為課程的內容。此外,當基礎施工災害的機制了解之後,再講授如果發現災害的徵兆,如何採取必要的緊急應變措施, 使災害消失於無形,這些應變措施分別按照技術及行政層面來敘述。
description.en: 英文名稱:Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures  The hazand during foundation excavation is retaining wall failure, this may be caused by heaving、boiling and piping。If excavation is conducted in granular soil in which retaining wall is found leaking, the migration of silty soil will trigger piping and eventually wall failure。 If excave embedded depth of retaining wall and point walls are insufficient, this can cause boiling and lead to wall failure。 If encavation is in cohesive soil and water content is higher than liquid limit, plastic flow will lead to huckling of bracing system and to the wall failure。 After the various failure mechanisms are explained, how to identify the symptoms and how to take urgent remedial measures both technology and administration are explained accordingly。

description.zh: 高性能混凝土之特性，材料，配比設計及試驗，品質管制，施工規範及構件行為。
