description.en: This course focuses on the characteristics of high performance concrete, composition materials, mixture design and testing, quality management, construction specifications, as well as structural behavior.

name.zh: 車輛工程產業與環境管理
name.en: Vehicle Engineering Business Management and the Environment

description.zh: 產業環境隨著社會經濟活動的頻繁而愈趨複雜。尤其是車輛工程產業，面臨到自政府機關、環保團體、社區團體的壓力，希望該產業的營運能確實達到維持生態環境的永續性。現今產業的營運，不僅要考量國內各個環境層面，也需顧及國際整體環境。目前環境議題整合產業管理決策規劃，對於相關產業更是一大挑戰。本課程主要希望學生透過產業個案的研討去(1)確認問題、分析情況、進而從產業環境著手問題的解?方向(2)評估、規劃與執行產業管理決策。確保產業營運與環境的永續共生。
description.en: The environment of business enterprise is far more complex than before.  Firms, especially vehicle engineering business, are feeling increased pressure from government regulations, environmental organizations, and community groups to ensure that business practices comply with the rule of Mother Nature.  Today's organizations need to concern the changing environment in not only the national dimension but also the international dimension.  On the other hand, the increasing attentions in environmental issues create new set challenges in management and strategic planning.  This course is designed for students who expect to undertake vehicle engineering business management in their career paths.  It is designed to enable you from each case study to (1) identify, analyze, and resolve problems from business environment, and (2) formulate, implement, and evaluate managerial and related strategies at the level of the business unit.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 本課程在透過研討，讓學生瞭解科技管理觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）創新與研發管理（2）科技政策（3）技術預測（4）技術策略管理（5）技術開發與移轉（6）技術規劃與評估。
description.en: The course teaches the student Technology Management concepts and trend . The topics will be covered: (1) innovation and R&D management; (2) technology policy; (3) technology forecasting ; (4) technology strategy management ; (5) technology development and transfer; (6) technology planning and measurement.

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解車輛省油不單純只是引擎燃燒性能或機構的改良而已，且另一個對車輛省油有重要貢獻的手段便是車輛的傳動系統技術的改良，此先進改良的方式增加學生對傳動系統重要性的認識。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of power train system, the relationship between engine and power train system, and the mechanical design of power train system. The purpose of this study is to increase the students' understanding in power train system.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

description.zh: 本課程針對目前通用之真空系統原理、設計及實務組裝等議題進行說明與分析。將先針對真空系統進行分類說明，並陳述真空系統實務組裝時所要考慮的事項，以及說明真空系統的抽氣概念與設計。真空腔體的設計原理將會詳細說明，並介紹中低真空、高真空及超高真空的系統設計。
description.en: This class explains and analyzes issues concerning the principle, design, and assembly of vacuum systems that are commonly used today. We will begin with the classification of the vacuum system, then goes into the cautions regarding the assembly of the vacuum systems, as well as the concept and design of the air extraction of the vacuum system. We will also discuss the design principles for the vacuum cavity, and the system design for medium-low, high, and super-high vacuum systems.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 空調中央監控系統之規劃設計。課程內容含設備運轉之操作管理，配合電力尖峰負載控制節電管理，能源有效利用控制，溫度、濕度、環境因子之監測及操控，故障監測維修控制等，並介紹空調系統運轉最佳化之方法。
description.en: This course is focused on the design and planning of central monitoring system for HVAC controls. The contents are the operating management of equipment, effective energy usage, temperature/humidity/environmental factors monitoring and control. The optimal methods applied in the operation of HVAC are also included.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation

name.en: Seminar of Services Marketing and Management

description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務行銷與管理，內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務環境（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）顧客價值管理（10）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）servicescape, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）customer value management,（10）service pricing.

description.zh: 本課程先以供應鏈之基礎理論為主題，之後輔以國內外製造業及流通業之供應鏈管理作案例討論。
description.en: This course firstly focuses on the fundamental theory of supply chain management. The case study on manufacturing industrial and retailing business will be also included.

description.zh: 探討企業如何蒐集、提供資訊，以有效強化策略管理，主題包括：1. 從價值鏈分析，掌握策略面的成本管理。2. 從資訊系統的策略性使用，引領企業創新。3. 以資訊科技再造組織，作為策略性目標的啟動機制。
description.en: 英文概述	The study of how organizations gather and provide information to facilitate effective strategic management, including:1. Strategic cost management via value chain analysis2. Strategic use of information systems for business innovation3. Using information technology as a re-engineering tool for achieving strategic initiatives

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course includes international economic environment, culture and political differentiation, international marketing organization, marketing combinational decision, and international marketing information system.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 本課程首先探討學校評鑑理論與實務相關議題，其次瞭解各國技職學校評鑑現況，並提出相關資訊以作為修正與改進當前技職學校評鑑實務的指引。
description.en: This course first discusses the concept of school evaluation, followed by a presentation of case studies of school evaluation from across the World. We also provide information to project staff and key stakeholders as a guide for revision and improvement of project plans, management, utilization of resources and training activities

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學校公共關係之理論與實務，提供修課學生對學校公共關係的認識。
description.en: The course is designed to develop the ability to manage the school public relation by exploring the concept and principles of school public relation and analyzing the current issues challenging all kinds of  educational institutes.

description.zh: 介紹學校產學合作教育理念、策略、程序、工作內容、案例與教學策略、產學訓合作教育模式，探討學校產學合作相關機制與問題，以作為應用之基礎。
description.en: Academic knowledge generates practical usage for technical-vocational school, and practice value from technical-vocational school helps to improve the academic world. This course is to explore the collaboration strategy, concept, cases, contents, and procedures for basis of application.

description.zh: 針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行主題探討，同時，就技職教育與訓練或人力資源等領域的相關從業人員進行能力分析，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: The course aims to (1) exploration of the main research in occupation analysis, (2) exploration of competency analysis in technical-vocational education and training program or in the field of human resource. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續教育統計學（一）課程，探討教育問題進階研究，所需之統計理論與方法。課程內容含卡方檢定法、多因子變異數分析、趨向分析、共變數分析、因素分析及無母數統計考驗等。
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

description.zh: 本課程旨在了解教育相關法規命令以及立法程序。討論重點包括大學法、師資培育法、教師法、教育人員任用條例...等主要法令。
description.en: This course aims to introduct the current case law and the knowledge of legislation. Topics include University Acr, Teacher Act, Training Act, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 促進教師瞭解生涯發展與規劃過程相關議題，輔助教師進行生涯探索、決策與規劃，並增強教師生涯發展的促動力量。
description.en: Promotes teacher awareness on issues relevant to understand the career development and planning processes across the lifespan, and assists teachers in their career exploration, decision-making and planning. Giving increased impetus to teachers' career development.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；課程重點包括認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派之分析、學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢等。
description.en: This course aims to study the peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on learning psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches, cognitive approaches and other related theories, types of learning, and applications of learning theories.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

name.en: Design and Evaluation of Web Teaching

description.zh: 探討網路線上教學的系統化教學設計與評鑑。內容包括線上教學的分析、設計、效益評估，以及線上教學策略、教師角色與任務、學生角色與任務、成功因素、線上教學經營管理、實際線上教學案例等。
description.en: To explore systematic design and evaluation of Web teaching including instructional analysis, design, and evaluation, and online teaching strategies, teacher roles and tasks, student roles and tasks, successful factor,online teaching management, practical online teaching cases etc..

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討成人與推廣教育的基礎、方法與其應用的情形，課程括二大部份；第一部份比較成人與推廣教育的理論基礎典範，第二部份除歸納分析主要的成人與推廣教育方法外，也同時探討其在技職專業教育領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course studies the foundations and methods that are relevant to the Adult & Continuous Education. It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育發展策略

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育教學發展策略，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in education development strategy. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research in education development strategy and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 介紹高分子材料：如纖維、塑膠、橡膠、生醫高分子化合物等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of polymeric materials. The various types of organic materials such as fibers, plastics, rubbers and biomedical polymeric compounds will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論2. 景觀生態設計理論3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討如何結合硬體建設與柔性需求的社區規劃，以創造理性生活空間。並從都市規劃設計、公共安全、社區結構過程與社區組織等不同層面聯繫建築與都市設計議題，探討社區發展問題與對策。課程內容主要包括：1.社區定義、相關理論、形成、類型、環境問題及改善策略。2.社區建設與發展之規劃主題。3.社區鄰里單元規劃、土地細分與計畫整合單元開發、國民住宅社區  規劃。4.社區管理與維護。5.社區規劃/社區營造與民眾參與。6.社區規劃與社區文化、生活品質及防災。7.社區規劃實務：實例探討。
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the way of community planning is          concerned with achieving a between physical creativity and well-being of   the community and to explore the development issues and strategies to cope with. Thus the course including : 8.Definitions, theories, genesis and morphology of the community.9.Issues and strategies of community development and planning.10.Neighborhood nuit planning land subdivision and unit development planning and public housing community planning ..etc11.Management and maintenance of community.12.Community planning development and public participation.13.Community planning and culture living quality as well as public safety.14.Community planning practice.

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討台灣地區從日據時期至民國八十年代都市規劃範型的演變，內容包括各歷史階段中的經濟、社會及政治背景的主要特徵，以及對應在都市規劃作業上的實際狀況。並藉由案例分析，使學生更深入認識都市規劃的本質及其背後各種支配力量和限制因素。
description.en: The course mainly explores the urban planning history during last one hundred years in Taiwan. The changing paradigms and the social, economic, and political contexts of each time period are discussed.In addition, many planning cases are analyzed to obtain the better ideas of what the characteristics of urban planning, the dominated powers behind, and the limitations are.

description.zh: 授課內容主要在介紹從事都市計畫或都市設計經常習用有關都市方面的資料蒐集、調查以及分析的各種方法，重點涵蓋都市空間理論、人口、產業、交通成長理論及相關的資料調查技術。所使用的分析方法包括統計分析、模式運用、地理資訊系統及試算表分析等，並以實例介紹有關都市人口、產業活動、交通運輸量的分析及預測，使學生能將學習的理論與與實務相結合，增進都市分析的專業能力。
description.en: The course focus is on the training of urban analysis methods to urban planning and design professions. The theories about urban spatial planning, population forecasting, economic development, and transportation analysis are introduced. Emphasis is laid on the methods of data collection and investigation techniques, geographic information system operation, statistics analysis, and spreadsheet utilization. Students are required to complete some related applications to improve both their academic abilities and professional capabilities.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

name.zh: 製造科技特論及實驗(二)
name.en: Special Topics and Experiments of Manufacturing Technology (

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程包括理論與實務，由製科所教授共同開課。第二學期探討的範圍包含製造設備、量測與檢測，側重在與製造業相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of institute of manufacturing technology. In second semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of manufacturing equipment, measuring and inspection, emphasizing in professional knowledge of manufacturing industry.

description.zh: 先修課程：半導體元件物理﹙4005032﹚。本課程著重於IC製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
description.en: A study on advanced IC process. The contents cover IC isolation technology, module process, interconnection line process, process integration, SOC applications and CMOS nano device engineering etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意工程最佳化方法導論，線性規畫法，非線性規畫法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規畫法介紹，機械元件與系統之最佳設計
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods,Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization,Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Technigues,Optimum Design of Mechanical Components and Systems

name.zh: 精密機械精度分析與控制
name.en: Analysis and control of Accuracy for precision Machinery

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械，機械安裝，精密機構，機構運動特性，力、流與熱影響，機械力與變形控制，電機運動控制，流體動力控制，環境相關事項。
description.en: Precision machinery, Machine installations, Precision mechanism, Movement properties of mechanism, Force, fluid and heat effects of structure, Mechanical control, Electrical control, Fluidic power control, Environmental issues。

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維與管理知能，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域創新管理相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計創新管理相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, communication, leadership, strategy, globalization, and interdisciplinary collaboration.

name.zh: 流行時尚族群行為研究

description.zh: 代表流行文化的流行時尚族群對生活物品的設計影響深遠。本課程針對此族群的生活型態、喜好度與期望性等因素，展開隨機性或系統性觀察，並配合訪談、問卷與實驗等研究步驟作資料收集。再經由資料分析（質化與量化兼具）與歸類，整理出流行時尚族群的興趣與傾向，作為流行生活用品設計的重要參考依據。
description.en: Fashion groups representing the popular culture widely affect the design of living artifacts. This study will focus on target groups' lifestyle, preferences and desirability to undertake casual and systematic observation. Additionally, the methods of face-to-face interviews, questionnaire and experiment are used to collect data and information and tend to be analyzed with the formation of qualitative and quantitative research. The final result will provide designers as guidelines, which might identify the target group's interest and preference.

name.zh: 生活資訊產品設計研究

description.zh: 隨著資訊科技的進步，資訊處理的功能被廣泛的加入到產品之中，成為典型的「互動系統」（Interaction System）。本課程重於使用者與資訊產品之間的互動介面設計。將探討到介面的使用是否容易；使用者是否能夠完成特定的工作等議題。討論的主題包括－認知模式、互動技術、符號系統、顯示螢幕的組織方式、以及數位原型建構方法。
description.en: With the progress of Information technology, the functions of information process have been added into appliance which is a typical interaction system. In the course, we will focus on issues related to interactive interface between information appliance and users. Those issues include cognition model, interactive technology, information architecture, and digital prototype.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，此包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系
description.en: "Resource Recovery and Managemet" is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consist of approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電化學基礎並探討有機反應電化學研究之應用技術及設備。
description.en: An introduction and fundamentals of method and equipment for the study of electroorganic reactions.

description.zh: 本課程探討聚合反應及應用反應機構，合成方式包含逐步聚合反應、鏈鎖聚合反應，共聚合反應並研討高分子的化學反應，及其他高分子有關技術。
description.en: The major topics include step reaction polymers, chain reaction polymers, copolymerization, reactions of polymers and polymer technology

description.zh: 線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一,著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明.課程大綱如下：1.解聯立方程式2.矩陣運算3.行列式4.向量空間5.線性轉換6.特徵值及特徵向量7.選擇性題材,視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法, Jordan form ,或線性規劃
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 1.電路元件2.電路特性3.網路方程式4.穩態分析及頻率響應5.網路函數：極點及零點6.雙埠網路分析7.傅利葉及拉普拉斯轉換
description.en: 1.Circuit components2.Circuit characteristics3.Network equations4.Steady state analysis and frequency response5.Network Functions: poles and zeros6.Two-port network analysis7.Fourier and laplace transform

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１.抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２.靜態結構及其儲存法，３.遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４.佇列，５.串列、鏈結串列，６.樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７.圖形，８.排序，９.搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 科技行銷的重點在於針對現在的科技產業、產品、技術、服務等等商品、巿場作一系統的、科學的、實務的研究與探討，其主要內容含：1.何謂科技產品，2.何謂科技巿場，3.科技產品的行銷定位，4.科技行銷策略研究，5.科技產品行銷推廣與調查，6.科技技術轉移及專利行銷，7.科技產業國際行銷，8.科技行銷的新趨勢。
description.en: 1.What is technology product? 2.What is technology marketing? 3.Strategy study of technology marketing. 4.Market survey of technology product. 5.Technology transfer.  6.Patent marketing.  7.International marketing strategy, 8.Development of technology marketing.

description.zh: 1. 基礎	1.1 使用者之特性	1.2 電腦之特性	1.3 人機互動2. 設計	2.1 可用性之原理	2.2 設計程序	2.3 使用者之模式	2.4 工作分析	2.5 對話記號及設計	2.6 系統模式	2.7 實作工具及支援	2.8 評估技術	2.9 線上協助及文件3. 進階課題	3.1 群體工作軟體	3.2 CSCW 課題及理論	3.3 多重感測系統
description.en: 1. Foundations	1.1 The human	1.2 The computer	1.3 The interaction2. Design Practice	2.1 Usability paradigms and principles	2.2 The design process	2.3 Models of the user in design	2.4 Task analysis	2.5 Dialogue notations and design	2.6 Models of the system	2.7 Implementation support	2.8 Evaluation techniques	2.9 Online help and documentation3. Advanced Topics	3.1 Groupware	3.2 CSCW issues and theory	3.3 Multi-sensory systems

description.zh: 表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，表面處理的 工業安全與衛生以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface treatment is an essential process at all kinds of manufacturing process, eitherin traditonal industry or in modern high-tech industry, surface treatment is alwaysplaying an very important role. The course mainly discusses the theory basis, methodand application of surface treatment technique, in order to cultivate interest andprofessional knowledge for students. The course contents include the fundamentaltheory of surface treatment, pre-treatment technique, all kinds of surface treatmentmethods and their related knowledge, the industrial safety and sanitation of surfacetreatment, and the application of surface treatment techniques.

description.zh: 粉末冶金是工業先進國家積極發展的重點科技之一，其內容涵蓋粉末製造、粉末成形固結以及燒結體的後處理等範圍，本課程即安排包括粉末製造、粉末特性與其測定、粉末混合與造粒、成形、燒結理論與實務、燒結體性質與其測定、燒結體的後處理等基礎項目。另外，再講述利用粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品的實務應用項目等，以期讓學生能對粉末冶金技術能有基本上的認識。
description.en: Powder metallurgy is one of the most important highlighted high-tech in the developed countries, its content includes powder making,powder formation and condensing,and the final treatment of sintered body,etc.Thus, this course includes the fundamental items such as powder manufacturing, powder characteristics and its test, powder mixing and granulation, formation, sintering theory and practice, the property of sintering body and its test, the post-treatment of sintering body. Besides, it also lectures practice method like using powder metallurgy to manufacture material and product, in order to let students have basic knowledge about powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 本課程將教授基本的統計工具以使學生能成為稱職的工程師。因此本課程將包含基本的統計課程，也會應用大量的實例說明統計的原理、方法及如何加以用於問題之分析，在課程中學生也將設計、實作及分析所提出之實驗設計。
description.en: This course will provide basic statistical tools to let students become successful engineers in industry.  We will cover the topics usually covered in a beginning statistics course, but also will include an introduction to factorial experiment in an effective way to investigate the potential effects of multiple suspected influences on a response.  The students will design, perform, and analyze a factorial experiment during this class.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Management of High Rise Buildings

description.zh: 1.高層建物之實態與傾向2.高層建物之火災災例分析3.高層建物火災時避難安全問題4.避難安全設計5.高層建物之火災安全對策6.實例研討
description.en: 1.Situation & Development of High-rise Buildings2.Analysis for High-rise Building in Fire3.Evacuation Safety on High-rise Building Fires4.Designing for Evacuation Safety5.Strategies of Fire Protection for High-rise Buildings6.Case Study

description.zh: 本科目主旨在於加強學生使用語言的表達能力、並促使學生更加容易瞭解學術論文。每週的課程是由一系列連貫性的論文來引導學生去學習即分析論文，並能以口語、寫作正確地表達出所分析論文的含義。這些所提供的研究論文都具備可精闢分析的要素。這些文章的內容有包含習慣的不同、事件的相對面、意見的分歧、喜好的差異、演繹法即歸納法得的結論等等。
description.en: This course aims to enhance oral and written communication skills and in the process provide a greater understanding of the philosophy underlying academic discourse. Weekly units are oriented around a progressive series of tasks which consider academic texts in context and require learners to understand, analyse and produce spoken and written texts appropriate to the context of academic English. The contextualisation of these tasks is the philosophical aspects of critical analysis. Themes, such as the difference between convention, fact, opinion and preference; deductive and inductive proof; validity and truth; evidence; and the ethics of persuasion, are the basis on which the skills are taught.

name.zh: 消費者行為與產品設計

description.zh: 介紹消費者行為與產品設計之關係, 研究市場趨勢與消費者之消費相關之需求、心理、行為、及文化特性, 以進行產品開發之規劃並訂定設計策略。
description.en: Introduction to the relationships between consumer behavior and product design. The trends of markets and the consumption characteristics are studied to make the plan of product development and set up the design strategy.

description.zh: 本課程主要以講座、研習營方式探討及演練有關生活實用科技及創意產業化之原理與實作。內容包括：生活實用科技與應用、智慧財產權與管理、數位音像設計與行銷、商業經營模式與設計管理、本土化創作與品牌經營、創意產業化與行銷。
description.en: Theory and Professional Practice on Workshop Subjects for Cultural Innovation and Business Management: （1）Applied technology for New lifestyle.（2）Intelligence property and its positioning.（3）Design and Marketing for multi-media.（4）Interaction between Business model and Design Management.（5）Indigenous works on randay.（6）Innovation Implementation and Marketing.

description.zh: 本課程提供領導的理論和最佳實務，使對於公司治理與構成的經驗，具有高度洞察力之價值。包括下列：1.	領導者的眼見與藝術2.	CEO的智慧3.	領導學的理論與實務4.	最新領導者的面向(Partnering and CRM)5.	公司治理的理念與基本原則6.	內部控制及對子公司之監理7. 公司治理之策略與行動
description.en: This course provides a deep insight into the values; govern corporation and formative experiences of the leaders of theory and best practice. It is included：1.	Vision and Art of the Leader.2.	Wisdom of the CEO/Leader.3.	Theory and Best Practice of leadership.4.	The New Face of Partnering and CRM. 5.	Concept and Principles of Corporate Governance6.	Internal Control and a Subsidiary Administration.7.	Strategic and Action of Govern Corporation.

description.zh: 企業研究方法提供企業解決問題和達成有效決策時所需知知識及技巧，其內容包括1. 了解企業研究特性並以科學思考的角度提出管理問題，2. 了解研究設計策略及其優缺點，3. 了解常用的調查方法及資料收集程序，4. 了解資料分析方法及成果的報告與表達。
description.en: The study of research methods provides student with the knowledge and skills that need to solve the problems and meet the challenges of a fast-paced decision making environment, which include1.	to understand the characters of business research method and propose the management problem or dilemma in scientific viewpoint,2.	to understand the strategies of business research and their evaluation,3.	to understand the research methods and data collection procedures,4.	to understand the data analysis methods/tools and report the final result.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助高階管理階層作決策。一般而言，這門課為商學課程中的課程主要協助學員們具有整合能力。學員不只是在策略管理中應活學活用，也融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課將幫助您學習、研讀個案和討論，這是此門課的目標。1.	瞭解組織所處環境2.	分析外部環境之時機和危機3.	剖析內部組織之優劣勢4.	探討企業不同層次之應對策略
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making at the top management level. Traditionally, this course has been the capstone course in the business program and is taught at the last year of study so that students can integrate functional area knowledge into a coherent one.  Students are expected not only to learn a body of knowledge on strategic management, but also to synthesize economics, accounting, and marketing as an aid top management level decisions.  We will use a combination of readings, case studies, and lectures to achieve the goals of the course.

description.zh: 本課程係針對企業高階管理碩士探討與企業財務與資本市場相關之財務管理決策問題。探討主題包括財務報表分析、企業資產評價、資本預算、財務風險與報酬、企業融資與股息政策。本課程並著重案例研討以驗證財務管理決策。
description.en: This course studies the financial aspects of managerial decisions especially on corporate finance and capital markets. The topics of this course includes financial statement analysis, valuation of real and financial assets, capital budgeting, risk and expected return, corporate financing and dividend policy. The course draws heavily on empirical research to help guide financial management decisions.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

description.zh: 軟性計算最佳化與傳統計算(硬性計算)最佳化的最主要差別在於軟性計算可以容忍對問題的不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性。實際上，軟性計算的主要模型係依據人類思維的模式或是生物系統的運作而發展出來的。軟性計算的主要導引基礎為:利用不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性，以獲得可追蹤，強健以及快速的解。軟性計算主要源於1965年由Zadeh所提出的模糊集理論，1973年提出的複雜系統分析與決策支援，1979年提出的軟性資料分析與機率理論。在更後期也陸續提出類神經計算與基因演算。本課程主要針對基因演算法(GA)與演進歸化法(EP/ES)進行討論，其他的方法如粒子群集(PSO)，模擬退火法(SA)也在本課程介紹之列。
description.en: The differences between Soft computing and conventional (hard) computing in that it can tolerant imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation. The key model for soft computing is the human mind or biological systems.  The guiding principle of soft computing includes: Exploit the tolerance for imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation to achieve tractability, robustness and low solution cost. The basic ideas underlying soft computing in its current incarnation have links to many earlier influences, among them Zadeh's 1965 paper on fuzzy sets; the 1973 paper on the analysis of complex systems and decision processes; and the 1979 report (1981 paper) on possibility theory and soft data analysis. The inclusion of neural computing and genetic computing in soft computing came at a later point. The main focus of this course will be in Genetic Algorithm (GA) and Evolutionary Programming/Evolutionary Strategy (EP/ES).  Other methods such as Particle Swarm Optimizat

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the vocational education related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     視覺檢測系統之硬體與原理，數位影像處理，特徵萃取及模式辨識，應用及案例研討，論文討論，專題研究。
description.en: Hardware and Principle of Vision Inspection Systems, Digital Image Processing, Feature Extraction and Pattern Recognition, Application and Cases Study, Special     Topics.

name.en: Special topics of modern manufacturing technology

description.zh: 介紹最新製造技術中的特殊項目，包括：1、製造實驗及統計分析2、製造設備，強調電腦化的運動控制及製程控制3、電腦化的製造系統，如CAD、CAM、CIM、LAN及因電腦化產生的系統進化。
description.en: Introducing special topics of newest manufacturing technology. Including:1.Manufacturing experiments and statistical evaluation.2.Manufacturing equipment, emphasizing on computerized motion control and process control.3.Computerized manufacturing system, like CAD, CAM, CIM, LAN, and manufacturing system 's evolution due to computerization.

description.zh: 先修課程：熱傳學或負責教授同意。控制體積熱傳計算法、有限元素熱傳計算法、熱電偶實驗量測法、液晶熱量測法、雷射全像干射法、紅外線熱顯像儀測溫法、實例模擬等。
description.en: By using control volume method and finite element method for numerical heat transfer calculation, we can obtain a global temperature field and heat flux for electronic device. Comparing with experiment's data, the theoretical theory and applications can be verified in this course. Including thermal couple method, thermochromic liquid crystals imaging method, laser interferometry method and thermal video system will be utilized in the experiments. The steady state and transient finned tube, conjugate heat transfer, and spot resistance heat transfer control will be derived and computed in the course.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 1. fundamental metallographic concepts.2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.3. Hardenability 4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機率基本觀念及數理隨機變數、工程常用的機率分佈函數、量測數據與參數估算、迴歸及相觀分析、可靠度之分析及運用、電腦模擬(蒙地卡羅)技術。
description.en: Basic Probability, Random Variables and Probability Distributions, Sampling Distribution, Maximum LikelihoodModel Fitting, Confidence Tolerance and Prediction intervals, Regression Analysis, Introduction to Monte Carlo Methods.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。齒輪應用的歷史、定義、分類及特殊輪齒、齒輪作用理論、齒輪之製作方法、齒輪損壞及負荷能力估算、齒輪潤滑、檢測等。
description.en: History of Gear Development, Definition, Classify, and Special Gear Profile, Principle of Gear Action, Gear Manufacture, Failure Type, Load Capacity Estimation, Gear Lubrication.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 人類賴以維生的地球自然資源日益匱乏，如何減少生態資源的消耗，同時增加經濟生產效率，乃是世界各國在追求永續發展的過程中所共同面臨的問題與挑戰。生態效益主要在於探討如何提昇資源利用效率，降低污染壓力，改善環境績效。「生態效益與永續發展」課程規劃為三學分，授課內容將涵蓋生態效益與經濟發展、生態效益與環境績效、生態效益的定義與評量、如何落實生態效益、生態效益伙伴關係、企業角色功能、案例研究等。
description.en: The natural resources,of which human being is heavily depending upon,are becoming scarcer as time goes by. How to reduce the depletion of natural resources while to increase the efficiency of economic production is the common problem and challenge for every countries in the world to encounter in pursuing sustainable development.Eco-efficiency is mainly to address the way to raise the efficiency of resources utilization,to reduce pollution stress, and to improve environmental performance. "Eco-efficiency and sustainable development"is designed as a 3-hour course. The content of this course will cover the following issues,including Eco-efficiency and economic development, Eco-efficiency and environmental performance, definition and assessment of Eco-efficiency, implementation of Eco-efficiency,Eco-efficiency partership,role and function of business,and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括：環境控制系統及分析、程序工程、系統動力學、及環境控制系統設計。
description.en: Analysis and design of process control systems in environmental engineering applications including process dynamics, instrumentation, and control system

description.zh: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作及計算等。包括光譜化學，原子吸收光譜，電漿發射光譜儀，發光光譜儀，電分析化學，PH計，電解沉澱法，伏安法，極譜儀，等儀器之探討。
description.en: This course discusses the theoryof instrumental analysis operation, the principle ofinstrument, structural operation and calculation. It includes spectrum chemistry,atomic absorption spectrograph, plasma jet spectrograph, light spectrograph,electric analytic chemistry, PH meter, electrolytic precipatation, volt ampere, polarspectrograph, etc..

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

description.zh: 本課程在闡述化學工業中以環保出發的催化劑之原理與應用。內容包括催化劑之化學結構、反應性、製備、物性鑑定、反應動力學分析。由催化循環、反應機制、催化劑結構、動力學來說明催化反應之原理。除此，並著重於介紹各催化反應應用類型：催化反應在溶液中、酵素、沸石孔洞及重要之工業固相觸媒。
description.en: This course explores the principles and applications of catalysts for the environmentally benign chemical processes. Topics include the concepts in chemical structure and reactivity of catalyst, catalyst preparation, catalyst characterization, and micro kinetic analysis of catalytic processes. The principles are illustrated with catalytic cycles, reaction mechanisms, catalyst structures, and kinetics. Additionally, we emphasis on applications of catalysis in solution, enzymes, solid and surfaces, within the molecular-scale cages of zeolites and sieves, the most important industrial catalysts.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹window 作業系統之基本操作技巧，word 文書處理軟體、Excel計算表軟體及Power Point 簡報軟體製作之 基本應用。
description.en: The course introduces the basic operating skills of the window system and the application software such as word processors (MS WORD) spreadsheet calculators (Excel) and the prestation media (Power Point ).

description.zh: 生醫材料論文探索是一門引導學生瞭解最新生物材料在組織工程上的發展與應用現況。針對進入生物醫學領域之初學者訓練論文資料收集、研讀整理、英文摘要之撰寫、及對專題表達能力之訓練。
description.en: This class will introduce students to current research topics and applications of biomaterials in tissue engineering. Students read current research papers, present the data, and learn to critique papers.

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生具備在輔助建築設計專業時，執行外部環境實際操作因子的整體概念。主要授課內容包括：一、景觀建築之規劃設計流程與技術：1.規劃設計流程、2.規劃設計資料之蒐集與調查、3.規劃設計之分析技術；二、景觀建築之實質環境因子：1.景觀建築之自然環境因子、2.景觀建築之社會環境因子；三、景觀建築之設計原理：1.景觀建築設計元素、2.景觀建築設計原理；四、景觀建築之工程實務：1.景觀建築之施工技術、2.景觀建築之整地工程、3.景觀建築之植栽工程。
description.en: This course provides integrated knowledge of making outdoor environment that is to be complementary to the professional training in architectural discipline. Main body of the course is that how physical and nonphysical factors of a landscape design are taken into account of design process and in what way these factors influence on architectural design. Content of the course is listed as followings. 13.	Design process and technique of landscape architecture10)	Design process11)	Data collection and landscape inventory12)	Landscape analyzing techniques14.	Physical factors in landscape design7)	Natural Process8)	Social process15.	Design theories and principles7)	Landscape elements8)	Design principles in landscape 16.	Landscape engineering 10)	Construction 11)	Grading12)	Planting

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

name.en: Introduction of the Architecture for the aged

description.zh: 1.研討老人身心特性與生活需求特徵。2.介紹老人居住設施種類與空間機能。3.了解老人社區活動與外出行動模式。
description.en: 1.To study and discuss the attributions of ageds' mental and   body and the characteristics of their live needs2.To introduce the types of the ageds' inhabitation   facilities and their space and functions.3.To understand the ageds' social activities and their outdoor behaviors' moods

name.en: Space and Culture of Digital Buildings.

description.zh: 數位化的空間設計和社會、文化理論和機能間的探討和應用。
description.en: Application of theories of social and cultural function to considerations of spatial layout and design of a particular building type.

name.en: Special topics on urban & culture revitalization

description.zh: 本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
description.en: This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

description.zh: 1.時變電磁場之介紹;2.平面電磁波;3.傳輸線之理論及應用;4.導波管與共振腔;5.天線與輻射系統。
description.en: 1.Introduction to Time-Varying Fields;2.Plane Electromagnetic Waves;3.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines;4.Waveguides and Resonators;5.Antennas and Radiating Systems.

description.zh: 認識高頻電子電路動作原理並建立高頻電子電路設計能力，1.傳輸線原理，2.高頻元件，3.散射參數，4.史密斯圖應用，5.小信號放大器，6.低雜訊放大器，7.射頻放大器，8.振盪器，9.混波與檢波，10.功率分／合器。
description.en: 1.Transmission lineas2.High frequency component3.Scattering parameter4.Smith chart application 5.Small signal amplifier6.Low nosie amplifier7.RF amplifier8.Oscillator9.Mixers and detectors10.Power combiner/spitter

description.zh: (A) 部分：1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，(B) 部分：1.認識Cadence系統， 2.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，3.零件庫介紹，4.設計電路之輸入編輯，5.電路模擬實習，6.數位電路的晶片設計，7.晶片製造專題。
description.en: (A)1.Basic CMOS logic design2.CMOS logic gate simulation 3.CMOS logic gate placement4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 5.Hierachy circuit6.VHDL system(B)1.Introduction to c cadence system2.Graphic editor practice3.module4.Input editor 5.Circuit simulation practice6.Special projects

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of     biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6. Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of b

description.zh: 1.軟體無線電簡介 2.射頻前級 3.類比數位和數位類比轉換 4.數位硬體的選擇  5.軟體最佳化 6.專題實作
description.en: 1.Introduction to software radio2.Radio frequency front ends3.Analog to digital and digital to analog conversion4.Digital hardware choices5.Software optimization6.Implementation project

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動,研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course provides study of ergonomical design related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 從性別研究的角度來看產品設計中的刻版印象，並提出創新設計的可能性
description.en: Look at the stereotypes within the products from a perspective of gender studies and come up with new ideas for creation.

description.zh: 本課程之目的係協助學生進行設計意象相關主題之研究與實務專題分析，以培養各種意象理論與分析方法之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the students whose topics of graduate projects are related to design image to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case analysis, and its contents contain image of material, image of shape, image of content, to establish the ability about theory of image and analysis method.

name.zh: 空間設計形式構成研究

description.zh: 從文化與歷史的觀點，看空間形式生成的歷程；從前人創作的結果，探究形式設計的創新門徑。本課程以人類生活空間包含器物、室內空間、建築外部、公共景觀設施等所呈現的各種形式構成為研究目標，回溯既往，以為創新。
description.en: To learn from the past, to build innovative creation on historical heritage, the course analyses aesthetic components from existing masterpieces in order to inspire ideas for innovative design work. Case studies are guided to investigate on 'form' appeared in our surrounding including interior space, furniture, architecture, infrastructure and landscape.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計創造力開發、創意設計手法與設計方法論等主題之碩士論文研究或實務專題設計，提供各種理論工具與個案演練。課程內容包括(1)人工智慧、心理學、人類學和語言學等導向之設計創造力研究，以及(2)規則式與案例式推理、基模類比與聯想、產品俗民誌、模式語言和體驗劇本等創意設計手法演練。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the graduate students whose topics of master's theses or graduate projects are related to creativity development, creative design skills and methodology, to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case studies, and its contents contain (1) design creativity research based on artificial intelligence, psychology, anthropology and linguistics, as well as (2) exercises of creative design techniques: rule-based reasoning and case-based reasoning, schematic analogy and association, product ethnography, pattern language and experiential scenario.

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述設計研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in design research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

name.en: A Value-Chain Analysis for Creative Industry

description.zh: 現代企業之競爭，已不再只是產品對產品之競爭，或服務對服務之競爭；現代的競爭已進入價值鏈對價值鏈的競爭。（設計）創意產業的價值鏈，可由創意、設計、產品開發、技術研發、生產製造、儲運、行銷通路、顧客服務及各項支援服務等所組成，而運作價值鏈最終目的乃是在滿足企業之利益關係者，包括顧客、員工、股東、合作夥伴、社區等的需求。本課程之目的乃在以創意產業實例，教導如何分析產業及企業之價值鏈，以瞭解價值鏈運作的基本原理，培養學生對產業界實際運作及如何提昇競爭力有完整的概念。
description.en: The competition for today's business world is no longer merely product vs product or service vs service.  Today's competitions among enterprises have become value-chain vs value-chain. A value-chain for a creative industry (e.g. design industry) consists of creativity, design, product development, R&D for new technologies, manufacture & production, inventory & logistics, marketing & distribution, customer services, and supporting services, etc.  The ultimate goal for operating a value-chain is to create values to satisfy the requirements of all stakeholders including customers, employees, stockholders/owners, partners, and community, etc. This lecture is to use real cases from creativity industry to demonstrate the analysis of a value-chain to understand the fundamentals of value-chain operations. This lecture is hopefully to provide students a better understanding of the relationship between academic knowledge and real world operations.  Through this understanding, students will learn

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論

description.zh: 1.需求面管理與節約能源2.負載管理策略與成效評估3.負載監控與需量控制管理4.汽電共生及其他能源應用5.配電自動化與配電管理實務
description.en: 1.Demand-side Management and Energy Conservation2.Load Management Strategy and Impact Evaluation3.Load Control Technology and Demand Control Management4.Cogeneration and Other Energy Applications5.Distribution Automation and Distribution Management Technologies

name.zh: 積體電路實體設計演算法
name.en: Issues Related to Manufacturing and Reliability

description.zh: 介紹VLSI設計流程及技術地圖基本演算法分割平面規劃擺置、繞線(整體繞線、細部繞線)時脈及電線/接地繞線壓縮佈置後最佳化時序建模及最佳化訊號/電源完整性其它和製作及可靠度有關之議題
description.en: Design Flow of VLSI and Technology RoadmapBasic AlgorithmsPartitionFloorplanningPlacement and Routing (Global Routing, Detail Routing)Interconnection of Clock and Power/GroundOptimization for post-processingModeling and Optimization of TimingSignal Integrity

name.zh: 電腦輔助積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程將給予學習者充分瞭解現代体電路設計技術如何產生矽晶片與應用在各種複雜電子系統上.課程內容如下所述:1.系統設計流程2.MOS電晶体理論3.IC制程技術4.電路效能評估5.CMOS電路與邏輯設計6.副系統設計7.期末專題計劃
description.en: The course dims to give an understanding of how integrated circuit technology is used today to implement complex electronic systems as silicon chips.Content in the course are:1.System Design Flow 2.MOS Transistor Theory3.Fnbrcation Process Technology4.Performance Estimation 5.CMOS circuit and Logic Designs6.Subsystem Design 7.Final Project

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意自動控制概論，汽車自動變速簡介，液動基本原理，液體接合扭力變換器，行星齒輪與超速控制，自動閥控系統與換檔裝置，液壓油與液壓油之冷卻，電動自動變速簡介，各式變速箱舉例。
description.en: Introduction to Automatic Control, Introduction to AutomobileTransmission, Hydraulic Principle, Hydraulic Coupling, Planetary Gears, Automatic Transmission Valve System, Hydraulic Oil Cooling System, Introduction to Electrical Transmission System.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意．煞車動力學，煞車性能之極限，液壓煞車系統及元件，鼓式煞車，碟式煞車，駐車煞車，真空輔助動力煞車，液壓輔助動力煞車，電動輔助動力煞車，防鎖死煞車系統．
description.en: Brake Dynamics, LImit of Braking Performance, Hydraulic-Brake-System Components, Drum Brake, Disc Brake, Parking Brake, Vacuum-Assist Power Brake, Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Electro-Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Antilock Brakes System。

description.zh: 運動方程式，一維振動（自由及強制），振動量測，二維振動，多維振動及機械應用說明。
description.en: Equation of Motion, Single-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration (Free and Forced), Measurement of Vibrations, Two-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration, Multiple- Degree-of-Freedom Vibration and its Applications in Mechanical Engineering.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

name.zh: 多媒體於機械工程之應用
name.en: Multi-medium techniques and their applications on         Me

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹各式多媒體軟體應用，以Flash動畫軟體為主，輔以不同軟體於機械工程上如︰實習、實驗及機構等之應用實例；使機械系的學生了解多媒體製作，進而發揮其創意及設計能力，將實務及構想以動畫之方式展現。
description.en: Introduce various multimedia application program, Use FLASH software, associated with related animation software, to behave Mechanical Engineering significance, such as courses of experiment practice and mechanism etc, This course will let student understand how the Multimedia be produced, develop their design capability as well as invention, and perform the practice and configuration by animation.

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態介紹2.目視檢測與非破生檢測3.現況評估與分析4.維修與補強設計
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures 2.Visual and Non-destructive Inspection 3.Condition Evaluation and Analysis 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態，介紹.2.目視檢測與非破性檢測。3.現況評估與分析。4.維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

description.zh: 超低溫冷凍通常指進行在-100℃以下特定低溫範圍之冷凍技術應用，譬如高能能物理同步輻射冷卻，生物醫學胚胎冷凍保存，大型超低溫冷能氣化發電廠與中、長程飛彈推進系統冷卻技術等，現代微系統科技多方面高層次應用上之必要技術。故如何進行實質而有效整合超低溫系統技術，是決定未來國力競爭之主要關鍵項目。本課程主要內容將涵蓋：1. 多段多元化自動冷卻系統技術。2. .超低溫循環冷媒特性。3. 生物基因晶化冷凍技術應用。4. 系統裝置之材料選擇。5. 電子微觀系統應用。6. 超低溫冷卻劑之檢測與分析。
description.en: At the completion will have learned of this course:1. Multiple stage and cascade refrigeration systems technology.2. Refrigerant characteristics for low-temperature cycle.3. Biomedical applications of cryogenic refrigeration.4. Choice of low-temperature materials for refrigeration systems.5. Research applications of electron microscopy.6. Refrigerant properties of super low-temperature coolants.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 污染源分析，室內空氣品質標準，濃度平衡之計算法，空氣之過濾原理與設計，建築通風法規，生物潔淨室標準，化學過濾應用，ASHRAE 62標準之探討
description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹應用於工業或製程上之冷凍系統的原理設計與應用。主要內容包含: 製冰、溜冰場、食品製程、水壩建造與相關土木應用、化學工業製程、以及相關冷凍節能技術。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to introduce the principles of the refrigeration systems used in industrial applications. The topics of this course include the following: 1). Ice manufacture. 2) Ice rinks. 3) Food processing. 4) Concrete dams and subsurface soils. 5) Refrigeration in the chemical industry. 6) Energy saving technology.

description.zh: 二極體特性，功率電晶體之飽和特性，單象限直流馬達驅動電路,四象限直流馬達驅動電路,MOSFET馬達驅動電路。
description.en: power diode characteristics, power transister in saturationdiode. single-graduant DC motor drive,four-graduant DC motor drive,MOSFET motor drive.

description.zh: 直流機數學模式與分析，直流機控制器設計，感應機數學模式與分析，感應機控制器設計，同步機數學模式與分析，同步機控制器設計。
description.en: mathematical models of DC machines,controller design ofDC machines,mathematical models of induction motors,driversdesign of induction motors ,controller design of induction motors ,mathematical models of synchronous machines,controller design of synchronous machines.

description.zh: 嵌入式系統是一種結合電腦軟體和硬體的應用，舉凡行動電話、遊樂器、影音設備等生活配備，或者是運輸系統以及工廠生產的自動控制，隨處可見嵌入式系統的應用。    本課程主要在介紹嵌入式系統之基本原理及應用，內容包含了有計算機概論、程式語言、作業系統、電腦網路、電腦硬體、Linux程式設計、嵌入式Linux系統介紹。
description.en: Embedded system is a combinative application of computer software and hardware. It includes mobile phones, TV games, video and audio equipments, transportation system and automatic control system produced by factories, and so on.     This curriculum mainly introduces basic principles and application of embedded system. It contains Computer Introduction, Programming Language, Operating System, Computer Network, Computer Hardware, Linux Programming, and Introduction to Embedded Linux system.

description.zh: 對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力系統控制，系統保護。
description.en: Symmetrical components, unbalanced fault, generator model, stability, voltage control system, power system control,

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

name.en: Special selected topics on control system engineering area

description.zh: 控制相關領域專題講座
description.en: Special selected topics on control system engineering area

description.zh: 知識管理是二十一世紀知識與學習型企業發展知識經濟最主要的技能，而營建與土木工程是一個需要專業知識的技術型產業，故亦應融入知識管理之理念。本課程基於上述理念，分別介紹營建興土木工程之相關專業技能，知識管理與企業e化發展技術，進而探討營建導入知識管理之技巧與方法。
description.en: Knowledge Management(KM) is the most important technique of learning type business for developing knowledge economy in the 21st century.Construction and civil engineering need to conduct knowledge management due to they are complex and full with professional techniques.This course will introduce related professional techniques of construction and civil engineering,the development technology of knowledge management and a e business,also will illustrate the conducting methods of construction knowledge management.

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 1.電磁相容簡介 2.傳導性電磁干擾量測 3.電力電子設備的EMI4.電磁干擾濾波器
description.en: 1.INTRODUCTION TO ELECTROMAGNETIC COMPATIBILITY 2.CONDUCTEDEMI MEASUREMENT 3.EMI IN POWER ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT4.EMI FILTER.

description.zh: 一.電力設備的故障二.比壓器,比流器三.保護電驛的構造及動作原理四.常用的保護電驛五.發電機與電動機的保護六.變壓器的保護七.線路保護八.異常電壓的預防九.熔絲十.保護協調
description.en: <一>INTRODUCTION<二>WHAT REALLY IS THE MVA METHOD<三>THE ABC OF THE MVA<四>WHY THE MVA METHOD<五>COMPARISON OF THREE METHODS<六>CAN PHASE-GROUND FAULT BE SOLVED <七>MVA METHODS FOR INSTANTANEOUS VOLTAGE ESTIMATE<八>THE SIMPLE COMPUTER TIME SHARE PROGRAM<九>CONCLUSION

description.zh: 一階電路分析；二階電路分析；弦波穩態分析；網路函數及網路理論；網路拓樸理論；狀態方程式；雙埠網路；頻率響應及波德圖；傅氏分析；傅氏轉換；拉氏轉換；迴旋積分；PSPICE。
description.en: The RL & RC Circuit Analysis,The RLC Circuit Analysis,SSS Analysis,Network Function & Network Theorem,Network Topology,State-Equation,The Two-port Networks,Frequency Response & Bode Plot,Fourier Analysis & TransformsPSPICE,Laplace Transforms,Convolution Integrals.

Course Title:MicroprocessorDescription:This course introduces the working principles of computer.It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theoryand appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction ofgeneral microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assemblylanguage program and module program, instruction addressing mode,instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. Morespecifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processingconfiguration are also discussed here. New topics will be added ifneeded.

description.zh: 介紹防止環境污染相關之防止技術。依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同污染源，分別探討解決空氣、水質、土壤、噪音以及熱污染之防治方法。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmental pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources.

name.en: Administration and management of car manufacturer

description.zh: 車廠佈置, 服務管理, 經營管理, 人事管理。
description.en: Workshop layout, service management, business management, personnel management.
