description.en: Part one--Fundamentals of optoelectronicsChapter one Crystals and junctions1-1Various crystals and their structures1-2Energy band diagrams1-3PN and Schottky junctionsChapter two Light emission and detection2-1 Direct and indirect semiconductors2-2 Photoluminescence2-3 Sensitivity, photoconductivity and optical gain2-4 Photovoltaic effectPart two--Photonic devicesChapter three Light-emitting devices3-1 LEDs3-2 Laser diodes Chapter four Light-detecting devices4-1 Infrared detectors4-2 Solar cellsPart three-Liquid Crystal Display (LCD)Chapter five LCD5-1 Optical waves in media5-2 Fundamentals of LCD5-3 Thin-film transistor (TFT) LCDPart four-Fiber Optic CommunicationsChapter six Fibers, losses, and dispersions6-1 Importance of fiber communications6-2 Losses in a fiber6-3 Signal dispersions in a fiberChapter seven Fiber Communications7-1 Components in a fiber communication system7-2 Dense

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究. 有關科技開發案之技術開發管理, 人力責任管理及時間任務管理等PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action)之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: C語言，指標，結構，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，排列，搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages,include  (1)ADT (abstract data type) and complexity ,(2)static structures and their storage representation ,(3)recursion,stacks,and prefix,infix,and posfix expressions (4)queues(5)lists,linked lists,(6)trees,binary trees,height balanced trees,heaps,(7)graph,(8)soring,and(9)searching,hashing.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹如何利用X-光晶體繞射方法以獲得高解析度蛋白質三維結構。課程內容包括蛋白質純化技術、晶體培養、繞射數據的收集及結構解析，並從各式各樣的結構來了解蛋白質的折疊方式、反應機制及其在生物科技上的應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce how to construct three-dimensional macromolecule structures by using X-ray diffraction method. This will include protein purification, crystallization, diffraction data collection and structure determination. This would lead to an understanding of the folding and reaction mechanisms of various proteins and its applications in biotechnology.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.傅立葉分析 3.微波網路 4.向量網路分析儀 5.頻譜分析儀6.時域反射儀 7.向量信號分析儀 8.天線量測
description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 1. 變頻器2. 電力轉換器3. 直流截波器4. 電源供應器
description.en: 1. INVERTER 2. CONVERTER 3. DC CHOPPER 4. POWER SUPPLY

description.zh: 本課程目的在於幫助學生瞭解現代的投資理論與其對投資管理的應用。當您完成此課，您勢必對證券評價與投資組合管理有透徹的瞭解。您將具備基本的理論技能，使您得以瞭解現代投資學的發展，並且熟悉與投資有關的實務。本課程涵蓋下列主題：1) 投資組合概念：風險與風險規避、風險性資產與無風險性資產之間的資本分配、最適風險性投資組合。2) 資本市場均衡：資本資產定價模型、單一指數與多因子模型、套利定價理論、市場效率。3) 固定收益證券：債券價格與殖利率、債券投資組合管理。4) 權益評價模型。5) 投資組合績效評估
description.en: The goal of this course is to provide a basic understanding of modern investment theory and its application to investment management. When you finish this course, you should have a thorough understanding of security pricing and portfolio management. You will have basic theoretical skills enabling you to understand modern developments in investments and you will be familiar with investment practices. The course will cover the following areas: 1) Portfolio Theory: Risk and Risk Aversion, Capital Allocation between the Risky Asset and the Risk-Free Asset and Optimal Risky Portfolios; 2) Equilibrium in Capital Markets: Capital Asset Pricing Model, Single-Index and Multifactor Models, Arbitrage Pricing Theory and Market Efficiency; 3) Fixed-Income Securities: Bond Prices and Yields, Managing Bond Portfolios; 4) Equity Valuation Models; 5) Portfolio Performance Evaluation.

description.zh: 讓學生了解投資的基本觀念，課程內容主管要介紹證券(股票、債券)、期貨、選擇權的投資，以及證券的評價模式和CAPM等訂價模式說明。
description.en: The course helps stdents to understand the knowledge of investment.  It includes security.  Future option and CAPM Models.

description.zh: 由於餐飲與旅館飯店和生活息息相關密不可分，期予學生能充份瞭解其基本常識，而能對人生有著實質上的助益。
description.en: People have always traveled for reasons of business, education & pleasure.  Hospitality industry has become more important in our life, especially in the future leisure time. There are three primary course objectives:(1) to provide a source of information & knowledge about hospitality operation & management in Service industry. (2) to provide basic knowledge for those who are entering the society, will eat healthy & drink happily in the future.(3) to provide an introduction for those who are considering careers in hospitality industry.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

name.zh: 人力資源發展政策與策略
name.en: Policies and Strategies of Human Resource Development

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展政策與策略之理論知識；（二）培養進行人力資源發展政策與策略的能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展政策與策略之關係、人力資源發展策略實務模式分析、人力資源發展政策之擬定、人力資源發展策略規劃方法、各級人力之發展、高階管理人員發展、國際化人力資源發展等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the theory of human resources policies and strategies of human resource development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of policies and strategies of human resource development. Topics including the relationship between policies and strategies of human resource development, the analysis model of strategies of human resource development, the methods of policy making of human resource development, the methods of strategic plan of human resource development, manpower development, high level managers development, international human resource development.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

name.en: The Romance of Three Kingdoms and The Chinese Culture

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用。基本上，以眾所熟知的歷史小說《三國演義》為主軸，來探討中國文化的發展過程中，其在歷史上所扮演角色地位。在文化精神上，它結合了儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的智慧結晶，開創了新時代的思維視野，對映著儒家文化的另股反思力量，擴展了豐富的文化精神，具有著人生啟示作用。準此，來充實學生文化素養，課程方面包括《三國演義》的文化心理結構，倫理觀，儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的政治思想，與人物形象之塑造等，藉以幫助學生清晰地認識《三國演義》文化精神在中國文化內涵中之特色。再授課方面，以師生共同討論為主，書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內認識《三國演義》的時代精神，並對日後生活有所助益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the role and significance of the historical fiction The Romance of the Three kingdoms in the development of the Chinese culture.In the spiritual aspect, The Romance of the Three kingdoms demonstrated the intellectual essence of Confucianism, Mohism,Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school of ancient China. It also innovates new visions and new horizons in the traditional Confucian milieu, thus enriching the spirituality of the Chinese culture. The course includes the following topics of The Romance of the Three kingdoms ：the cultural psychological structure, the ethic view, the political views of Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school, the characterization, etc. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also expected to submit written reports.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 從早期的原住民社會，到漢人移民社會的建立，乃至今日多元化的工商業社會，在不同的年代歌謠與大眾生活的關係密切。傳統社會中民間歌謠具有祈福、教化、娛樂等功能，為數甚巨的民間歌謠是理解庶民社會的重要途徑；而當今社會中流行歌謠雖是商業機制下的產品，但其映見了大眾的情感與價值觀，也記錄了社會變遷的軌跡。本課程主要以台灣的歌謠為文本，透過歌謠內容的爬梳整理，以歌謠為史料建構大眾的生活圖像，生動地呈現出台灣社會變遷的面向。 從早期的原住民社會，到漢人移民社會的建立，乃至今日多元化的工商業社會，在不同的年代歌謠與大眾生活的關係密切。傳統社會中民間歌謠具有祈福、教化、娛樂等功能，為數甚巨的民間歌謠是理解庶民社會的重要途徑；而當今社會中流行歌謠雖是商業機制下的產品，但其映見了大眾的情感與價值觀，也記錄了社會變遷的軌跡。本課程主要以台灣的歌謠為文本，透過歌謠內容的爬梳整理，以歌謠為史料建構大眾的生活圖像，生動地呈現出台灣社會變遷的面向。
description.en: From the early aboriginal society to the immigrant society of the Hans and even to the current society, songs--in different period of times--always play an important role in civil life. In traditional society, folksongs perform the functions of instruction, religion and entertainment. A large number of folksongs serve the gateway to understand the common people.  Though today's pop-songs are the products of entertainment business, they still reflect common people's emotions and values as well as label the mark of social change.  Taiwanese songs (including folksongs and pop-songs) are important texts in this course. Through the analysis of the song lyrics, the students are expected to draw a vivid picture of the social change in the past.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養有效率的工業人才。包括生產、分配、消費財貨與勞務的各部門，無論是新進的員工或最高層的經理，如要請求效率，則定須具備本門知識。本課程分四方面：（一）、人事心理，包括工作分析，人事選用程序及方法，人事測驗原理及應用，工作考核，員工訓練，工作評價；（二）、組織社會心理，包括動機理論與管理，態度與士氣的測量，組織理論與人行為，領導行為，員工參與，意見溝通；（三）、工程心理，包括工作環境與工作效率，機械設備與工作設計，意外防止與工業安全；（四）、消費心理，包括消費行為，廣告宣傳。上課方式包含講授，討論個人習作等。
description.en: This course is designed for cultivating the effective industrial workers. Whoever he is, the person should be full of the knowledge of Industrial Psychology if only he is working and if only he wants to be an effective worker, no matter he is a new person or top management, working in industry or in business, for government or for forivate institute, The focuses of this course will be on (1)personal psychology:including job analysis, personel selection program, the principles and appliance of personnel tests, performance appraisal, personnel training training, job evaluation, (2)social psychology of the organization:including the theory and management of motivation, the measurement of attitude and morale, leadership, employee participation, communication; (3)engineering psychology:including work conditions and industrial effectiveness, machine and job design, accident prevention and insustrial safety; (4)consumer psychology:including consum behavior and advertising. In class, lecture,

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 本課程是初級日文（一）的延續，再利用半年一學期的時間，強化學生對日語的興趣，培養日語聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達溝通目的，並增進對日本文化的認識，擴大國際視野。授課使用視聽教材，注重會話及聽力。內容：1.生活會話（問候、興趣、好惡、休閒、購物、職業等）2.童謠歌曲、民俗文化等。
description.en: This is a continue course of Japanese (1). Within a half-year study, students are expected to keep their interest in study Japanese language, further improve their communication skills, better understand Japanese culture, and become globalization. This course contain: 1.daily conversation （hobby, interest, Leisure, shopping, occupation etc.）2.folk songs and traditional culture of Japan.

description.zh: 諺語是人類生活智慧在文字語言上的極致表現，藉著短短的一句話卻能表達出內涵豐富的意義，西洋諺語中在人際關係上有許多獨特的見解，不但深入且幽默更發人深省的句子；例如：(1)Give and take.  (中譯：施與受；與人交往應有來有往，互相體諒。)  (2)Wake not a sleeping lion. (中譯：勿驚擾睡獅；即勿自找麻煩。)    本課程目標為：(1)從西洋諺語中讓學生瞭解人性的需求以及人際關係的基礎 (2)從含意深刻的西洋諺語中使學生體會正確的人生態度，進而明白建立良好人際關係的技巧 (3)藉西洋諺語之介紹讓學生瞭解諺語之典故、使用法，達到提昇學生英文涵養之目的。    本課程將採取啟發法、小組討論、上台報告等授課方式，藉以增進學生思考及上台說話之能力。
description.en: Proverbs are the wisest words expressed in human life. By means of the short sentence, it has profound meaning. There are many particular views, not only deep but humorous, about human relationships in English proverbs. For examples: (1) Give and take. (2) Wake not a sleeping lion.  Both are short and have metaphor related with human relationships.     The objectives of this course are: (1) Let students understand the human needs and the bases of human relationships through English proverbs. (2) Let students realize the right attitude about the ways one should treats people, and then can establish the better technique for human relationships. (3) By means of using English proverbs to make students understand the proverbs' origin, usages and then to improve students English ability.    This course uses the methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, student presentation, and etc. In these ways we can advance students' ability to do deep thought and improve their speech ability when

description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

name.en: An Introduction to Philosophy of Ecology

description.zh: 本課程將介紹分析下列基本思想：生態中心主義（內含深層生態及動物權及自然權、土地倫理、檢樸生活）、人中心主義（內含淺層生態/環境主義及環境正義、本土化及環球化等議題）、生態女性主義、荒野保護主義、生態社會主義，時間輪迴歷史觀, 綠色宗教論述 (如基督教生態思潮、佛經生態思潮、儒家與生態，原住民生態論述，以及後現代生態科學論述（內含混沌、複雜、模糊及量子力學等理論）。
description.en: Our course will critically and analytically introduce the following basic concepts: ecocentrism (covering deep ecology, rights of nature, right of animals, land ethics, and simple lifestyle), anthropocentrism (shallow ecology and environmentalism covering local and global issues ), ecofeminism, preservation of wilderness, ecosocialism, cyclic perspective of history, greening religions (eco-Christianity, eco-Buddhism, Confucianism and Ecology, indigenous ecological discourses, postmodern theories of sciences  (including chaotic theory, fuzzy theory, theory of complexity, and quantum theory).

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格 2.企業環境的偵察 3.策略形成 4.策略執行與評估 5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function involved in management. The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning. The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 本課程中說明如何網路創業，並包括實際操作。
description.en: The course is teaching how to initiate a business on the internet.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解行銷通路之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路與行銷管理的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程，通路結構，通路行為，通路溝通，通路策略及通路續效評估等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in marketing channel. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making channel decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations, and a term paper.

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 本課程主要以土地資源之「自然」、「經濟」為綜合體探討，研究其類型特徵、數量價值、調查評價、開發利用、經營管理、保護與等問題的綜合知識，尤著重都市土地問題探討。在課程內容上，根據學科發展現狀，明確和規範土地資源方面一些基本概念，如土地、土地資源、土地資源類型及土地資源的各個組成要素等，並加強了土地資源管理開發領域的一些研究內容和方法的介紹，如土地利用、土地生態設計、土地整理、土地開發、土地利用監測等內容之概論。
description.en: The course mainly focuses the comprehensive dimensions on the "Nature" and "Economics" of land resources. The type characteristics, amount and value, survey and evaluation, development and use, management, and preservation of land resources, especially problems of urban land, would be discussed.  According to the state-of-the-art trends of this discipline, the course covers some basic concepts of land resources that should be clarified and specified, including land, land resources, the types and components of land resources, and many among others. Also, the knowledge and methodologies concerning land resource development and management, such as land use, land ecological design, land reclamation, land development, and land-use monitoring, will be introduced.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

description.zh: 1.資料模式基礎知識：資料、資料庫、資料庫系統、資料庫管理系統、資料模式、資料庫的優、缺點 2.	關聯模式：關聯模式結構、相關用語、鍵、SQL、Relational Algebra3.正規化：功能相依、第一正規化、第二正規化、第三正規化、Boyce-Codd 正規化、第四正規化4.資料模式之建構：資料模式建構之目標、使用者觀點、連結對應關係之建立、資料模式圖示工具、資料模式建構之方法 、資料模式建構實例5.資料模式建構與資訊系統發展：資料來源、資料描述、資料模式建構與資訊系統發展之相關6.資料倉儲與線上分析7.資料前處理、資料淨化、資料整合與轉換、資料簡化、資料二元化與概念階層8.	資料探勘系統與語言
description.en: 1.Background knowledge of Data Model: Data, Database, Database System, Database Management System, Data Model, Advantage and Disadvantage of Database  2.Relational Model: Structure of Relational Model, Terminology, Key, SQL, Relational Algebra  3.Normalization: Functional Dependence, First Normal Form, Second Normal Form, Third Normal Form, Boyce-Codd Normal Form, Fourth Normal Form  4.The Construction of A Data Model: The Goal of Data Model Construction, User View, The Association Between Entities, Depicting Tools for Data Model, The Data Model Construction Methodology, The Example of Data Model Construction  5.Data Model Construction and System Development: Data Source, Data Description, The Relationship Between Data Model Construction and System Development  6.Data warehouse and OLAP technology  7.Data Preprocessing, Data Cleaning, Data reduction, Discretization and Concept Hierarchy Generation  8.Data Mining Primitives, Languages and System

description.zh: 以實務應用的角度，幫助同學瞭解市場調查的涵義，發展及進行程序。其次以實際演練的方式，透過問卷的設計及發放，蒐集相關資料，並協助同學應用軟體，將市調所得資料進行整理、分析與解釋，最後以市場調查綜合個案報告之演練方式，以培養同學市場調查相關活動的基本概念與能力。
description.en: To help the students to know the connotation, development and procedure of marketing Research by the view of practice application.  In addition, to help the students to design and distribute the questionnaire. To collect, analysis and explain the data of market survey by using computer software.

description.zh: 本課程之開課，在建立課程評鑑的基本概念，包括課程評鑑的意義、目的、範圍、模式、類型、程序、規準等；進而探討技職教育課程評鑑的現況與問題，並提出改進建議。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the rationale of curriculum evaluation in technical-vocational education, including the definition of evaluation, purposes of curriculum evaluation, models of evaluation, types of evaluation, and the procedure and the criterial of curriculum evaluation. Besides, the course asks the students to the review the present situaation of curriculum evaluation in technical-vocational education fromthe theoretic perspectives.

name.en: Ice Thermal Storage Air Conditioning Technology

description.zh: 本課程內容包含：儲冰空調系統概論、基本系統設計考量、各種儲冰技術比較、冰盤管內融冰式儲冰系統、冰盤管外融冰式儲冰系統、冰球式儲冰系統、製冰滑落式儲冰系統、優態鹽儲冰系統、儲冰空調系統設計步驟、儲冰空調系統之檢測以及實際案例研討。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a practical level of the knowledge of cool thermal storage technology. The course includes the following topics: 1) Introduction, provides basic background on cool storage concepts and terminology. 2) Fundamental design considerations. 3) Comparison of storage technologies. 4) Internal melt ice-on-coil storage systems. 5) External melt ice-on-coil storage systems. 6) Encapsulated ice. 7) Eutectic salt phase-change materials. 8) ice harvesting systems. 9) Design procedure. 10) Performance testing and 11) Case study.

name.en: District heating and cooling system  technology

description.zh: 區域冷暖房系統，係指將大型區域或特定建築物群之空調系統加以整合規劃，把供應空調所需之冰水主機、鍋爐及發電機等重大設備，統籌集中於一主機中，利用共通管路輸送冷、暖氣及熱水至各使用地區。由於空調系統經過整合，各區空調需求之參差因數可互補，故系統互通效應更高，冰水主機或鍋爐容量可大為降低，其次本系統作為工廠廢熱、垃圾焚化發電以及供給大學校園電力，冷氣與暖氣、溫水等，皆能到達總耗能效率80%以上。
description.en: All district energy systems have four basic components: a fuel source, the central production plant, a distribution network, and its connected customers. Typically the thermal energy is used for space hearing, space cooling, or process needs and when combined with the production of electricity in central plant is also considered to be a cogeneration  facility. Combined heating, cooling and power generation in a single facility can offer attractive investment returns with lower capital costs than other alternatives.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，包括一次及二次系統的設計考慮，配電變壓器的應用，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Planning and automation of power distribution systems, including system design considerations, power transformer applications, voltage and power loss and calculations, modulations of power supply, load analysis, and failure analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。曲軸沖床、各單元件之設計與構造要點、剪斷原理與過程、變形原理、成形現象、引伸原理、力的分析、設計實例、連續引伸的設計程序。
description.en: Structure and design Fundamental element of craft, punching, principle and process of steaming cutting, principles of deformation, forming phenomena, design and manufacturing process of continuous stretching.

description.zh: (1)作業系統簡介 (2)工作觀念之介紹：異步及平行程式處理(3)記憶體管理：實際及虛擬記憶體之管理 (4)處理機管理：工作排序及多元處理 (5)輔助儲存體之管理：磁碟排序，檔案及資料庫 (6)網路作業系統及安全性(含分散式資料處理)(7)範例研究：DOS，UNIX Windows NT。
description.en: 1.History and evolution 2.Process concepts3.ASynchronous concurrent processes4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt5.Real storage management6.Virtual storage organization and management 7.Processor scheduling 8.Disk mansgement9.Network and security

name.zh: 組織學習與行銷知識管理
name.en: Organizational Learning and Marketing Knowlege Management

description.zh: 本課程以理論為出發點，分析組織學習在行銷管理中資訊處理與知識管理的角色，課程主題包括,組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論, 顧客價值管理理論,知識管理概論,行銷知識創造與轉移知識管理個案,知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will analysis how organizational learning impacts on the marketing information process and knowledge management. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, and customer value management, marketing knowledge management.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techinques. Physical  Bases  of  Tests, Materials  to which applicable, Calibration Standards, and  Reliability.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.
